AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Focus on achieving balance and harmony within yourself. Cultivate patience and moderation in all areas of your life, and your soulmate will be drawn to this energy.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on managing extremes and finding balance in your life. Avoid emotional highs and lows, and aim for moderation to create the space for your soulmate to enter.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the importance of balance, moderation, and patience. You will learn to cultivate harmony and peace through your interactions with your soulmate.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn the difficulties of imbalance or extreme behavior, and how these can impact the health of a relationship. Moderation will be a key lesson.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: A harmonious, balanced, and peaceful relationship where both partners bring out the best in each other through patience and moderation.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may experience challenges due to imbalance or emotional extremes, leading to difficulty maintaining peace and harmony.

name: The Devil (Card 15 in the Major Arcana)

uprigth.keywords: Bondage, addiction, materialism, control, temptation.
uprigth.advice: Examine where you might be allowing negative influences or attachments to control your life. Break free from limiting beliefs and behaviors.
uprigth.description: The Devil represents bondage, addiction, and self-imposed limitations. It often indicates feelings of being trapped or controlled by external circumstances or unhealthy attachments. This card encourages you to examine where you might be giving away your power or allowing negative influences to control your life. The Devil can also signify indulgence in desires or temptations that may be leading you astray. It's a reminder that while these forces may feel overwhelming, they are often of your own making and can be overcome by confronting them with awareness and determination.

reversed.keywords: Liberation, breaking free, overcoming addiction, reclaiming power.
reversed.advice: Break free from limiting beliefs and behaviors. Take steps toward liberation and reclaim your personal power.
reversed.description: Reversed, The Devil suggests liberation, breaking free from addictions or unhealthy attachments. It indicates that you are in the process of overcoming negative patterns or behaviors that have been holding you back. This card encourages you to take steps toward reclaiming your power and freeing yourself from self-imposed limitations. It may also suggest that you are beginning to recognize the impact of toxic influences in your life and are ready to make positive changes.

uprigth.keywords: Temptation, addiction, materialism, unhealthy attachments.
uprigth.advice: Be aware of unhealthy patterns in your relationships and strive for freedom from them.
uprigth.description: The Devil symbolizes temptation and unhealthy attachments in love. It may indicate that you are in a relationship characterized by materialism or addiction, or that you may be feeling trapped in a situation. This card encourages you to examine your attachments and seek freedom from negative influences, allowing for healthier connections in love.

reversed.keywords: Liberation, breaking free, overcoming addiction.
reversed.advice: Take steps to break free from unhealthy patterns in your love life and embrace healthier connections.
reversed.description: The reversed Devil signifies liberation and the breaking free from unhealthy attachments. You may be overcoming obstacles in your love life and seeking healthier relationships. This card encourages you to continue on this path of self-discovery and healing, fostering connections that promote personal growth and happiness.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate may possess intense, magnetic, or passionate qualities. However, they might also struggle with materialism, attachment, or unhealthy habits.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may have broken free from past unhealthy patterns or attachments. They’ve likely undergone personal transformation, overcoming issues of control or addiction.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You may meet them during a time of personal or emotional conflict, when you're dealing with attachment issues or material concerns.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You will meet them after you or they have released unhealthy attachments or toxic behaviors, perhaps following a period of personal growth or healing.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is intense but may feel controlling or obsessive. There may be elements of passion, desire, and attachment that are hard to resist, but they could lead to feelings of entrapment or dependency.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship is breaking free from emotional toxicity or unhealthy attachment. While it may have felt overpowering, there's an opportunity to release emotional bondage and reclaim personal power.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The challenge may lie in overcoming attachment, temptation, or dependency. Both partners need to be aware of the potential for unhealthy dynamics or control issues.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: The obstacle could be breaking free from past toxic patterns or fears of repeating them. There may be hesitation to enter the relationship out of fear of falling into old habits.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Be mindful of your attachments and any tendencies towards control or materialism. Work on freeing yourself from negative patterns before seeking a connection.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Focus on maintaining personal freedom and emotional independence. Let go of any fears or past attachments that may hinder your ability to find true love.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the power of temptation, attachment, and material desires. You may learn the importance of setting healthy boundaries and avoiding codependency.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn the value of freedom and personal autonomy in relationships. Breaking free from toxic patterns will be a central theme in your growth.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship may be intense and passionate, but could also have toxic or controlling elements if not handled carefully. Balance is key.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship has the potential for liberation and personal growth if both partners work together to avoid old, harmful patterns.

name: The Tower (Card 16 in the Major Arcana)

uprigth.keywords: Sudden change, upheaval, destruction, liberation, transformation.
uprigth.advice: Embrace change and be open to rebuilding your life on more solid foundations. Trust that even in the midst of chaos, growth and liberation are possible.
uprigth.description: The Tower is a card of sudden change, upheaval, and transformation. It often represents a moment when everything you thought was stable comes crashing down, forcing you to rebuild from the ground up. While this may feel like a crisis, The Tower’s message is ultimately one of liberation—what is destroyed is often something that no longer serves you, making way for new growth and insights. The Tower can signify unexpected events, revelations, or sudden shifts in your life that challenge your foundations. It encourages you to embrace these changes, as they are necessary for your spiritual and personal evolution.

reversed.keywords: Avoidance of change, resistance, rebuilding, delayed disaster, clinging to old structures.
reversed.advice: Stop resisting change and face challenges directly. Begin the process of rebuilding on stronger foundations.
reversed.description: Reversed, The Tower can suggest that you are resisting change or trying to avoid a crisis. You may be holding onto a situation that is no longer sustainable, which could lead to greater upheaval later on. This card encourages you to face challenges head-on instead of delaying the inevitable. It can also indicate that you are beginning to rebuild after a period of chaos or destruction. While the process may be difficult, you are moving toward greater stability and clarity.

uprigth.keywords: Sudden change, upheaval, revelation, chaos in love.
uprigth.advice: Embrace the changes that are coming, even if they are difficult, as they may lead to growth.
uprigth.description: The Tower represents sudden upheaval and change in your love life. It may indicate a revelation that shakes the foundations of your relationship, leading to chaos or an unexpected breakup. While these moments can be painful, they often lead to necessary transformations. Embrace the lessons that come from the chaos, as they can lead to a stronger foundation for future relationships.

reversed.keywords: Avoidance of disaster, fear of change, stagnation.
reversed.advice: Don't avoid necessary changes; facing them can lead to healing and growth.
reversed.description: The reversed Tower warns against avoiding necessary changes or sticking to a relationship that is no longer serving you. Fear of upheaval may be causing you to stay in a stagnant situation. This card encourages you to confront the truths you may be avoiding and take action toward a more fulfilling love life.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is someone who brings about major transformation, often shaking up your life in unexpected ways. They are likely to challenge your beliefs and push you to grow.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may have gone through significant personal upheaval and is now in the process of rebuilding their life. They could be cautious, having learned hard lessons from their past.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet them during a time of great upheaval or change in your life. It might come after a personal crisis or significant life shift.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: Meeting them may happen after you or they have gone through a period of rebuilding or recovery, following a dramatic life event.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is going through a sudden upheaval. What was once stable may feel like it's crumbling, but this shake-up is necessary for truth and authenticity to emerge. It can be shocking but ultimately transformative.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: There may be emotional instability or avoidance of necessary changes within the relationship. While the connection feels fragile, one or both partners might be resisting the inevitable transformation, leading to prolonged emotional distress.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The challenge may lie in the intensity of the changes that come with the relationship. Sudden upheavals or shocking revelations could make it hard to maintain stability.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: The difficulty might stem from resisting necessary changes or avoiding the aftermath of past crises. Fear of more upheaval could hold you back.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Embrace change and be willing to let go of old structures that no longer serve you. Be open to transformation, even if it feels uncomfortable.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Focus on rebuilding your life after past challenges. Don’t fear change, but also take care to rebuild with intention and mindfulness.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the power of change and the necessity of breaking down old structures to make room for growth. You will learn to embrace transformation.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn about the importance of rebuilding and healing after turmoil. The relationship may show you how to create stability after chaos.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: A transformative relationship that could shake up your life in significant ways, leading to personal growth and new perspectives.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship has the potential for healing and rebuilding after initial turmoil. However, both partners must be willing to face the changes head-on.

name: The Star (Card 17 in the Major Arcana)

uprigth.keywords: Hope, inspiration, renewal, faith, healing, spiritual guidance.
uprigth.advice: Stay hopeful and trust in the future. Allow yourself to heal and find inspiration in the world around you.
uprigth.description: The Star is a card of hope, inspiration, and renewal. It signifies a time of healing and optimism after a difficult period. When The Star appears, it encourages you to have faith in the future and to trust that the universe is guiding you toward greater happiness and fulfillment. This card is a beacon of light, reminding you that better days are ahead. The Star also represents spiritual guidance and inspiration. It encourages you to tap into your inner wisdom and to believe in your ability to create the future you desire.

reversed.keywords: Hopelessness, doubt, pessimism, disconnection, lack of faith.
reversed.advice: Reconnect with your inner guidance and renew your sense of hope. Trust that things will get better, even if it’s hard to see right now.
reversed.description: Reversed, The Star may indicate feelings of hopelessness or a lack of faith in the future. You may be going through a period of doubt or pessimism, struggling to see the light at the end of the tunnel. This card encourages you to reconnect with your inner guidance and to have faith that things will improve. It can also suggest that you are feeling disconnected from your spiritual path or from the things that inspire you. The reversed Star urges you to rekindle your faith and hope, even in difficult times.

uprigth.keywords: Hope, inspiration, renewal, serenity in love.
uprigth.advice: Stay hopeful and trust in the healing and renewal that love can bring.
uprigth.description: The Star symbolizes hope and renewal in your love life. It suggests that healing is possible, and it encourages you to remain optimistic about your romantic future. If you’ve been through challenges, this card assures you that brighter days are ahead, and love will bring serenity and inspiration.

reversed.keywords: Lack of faith, discouragement, insecurity in love.
reversed.advice: Reconnect with your hopes and dreams in love to regain faith in relationships.
reversed.description: The reversed Star indicates feelings of discouragement or a lack of faith in love. You may be feeling insecure or disheartened by past experiences. This card urges you to reconnect with your dreams and hopes, allowing yourself to heal and restore your belief in the possibility of love.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate will be someone who brings hope, healing, and a sense of serenity into your life. They are likely to be optimistic, inspiring, and deeply spiritual.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may be struggling with self-doubt or a lack of faith in themselves. They might appear pessimistic or lost, seeking guidance or healing.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet them when you are in a phase of renewal or personal healing, likely after a difficult period in your life. It will be a time of hope and newfound clarity.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may meet them during a time of emotional confusion or disillusionment, possibly when you or they are struggling with self-worth or clarity about the future.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is filled with hope, healing, and optimism. There's a sense of renewal and emotional clarity, with both partners feeling supported and inspired. This relationship offers emotional rejuvenation and faith in the future.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: There may be emotional disappointment or a loss of hope within the connection. Doubts or insecurities could cloud the relationship, making it hard to see a positive path forward. Healing is needed to restore faith in the bond.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The challenge may be maintaining hope and faith in the relationship during difficult times. Both partners need to trust in the connection and the healing it can bring.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: The obstacle could be a lack of faith or trust in each other, or a fear of vulnerability. Past disappointments may be preventing one or both partners from fully opening up.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Keep faith in your journey and continue focusing on personal healing. Be open to new experiences and stay hopeful about love, even after setbacks.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on restoring your sense of hope and healing before seeking this connection. Release any negativity or past wounds that may be blocking your ability to attract love.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the power of hope, faith, and healing. You will learn that love can be a source of inspiration and spiritual growth.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn the importance of restoring hope and trust, both in yourself and in your partner. Overcoming emotional blocks will be key to the relationship's success.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential for deep healing, growth, and spiritual connection. It will be a source of hope and renewal for both partners.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship could struggle if past wounds aren’t healed, but it also has the potential for recovery and renewed faith if both partners are willing to work through their issues.

name: The Moon (Card 18 in the Major Arcana)

uprigth.keywords: Illusion, intuition, uncertainty, subconscious, fears.
uprigth.advice: Trust your intuition and explore the deeper aspects of your subconscious. Be mindful of illusions and false perceptions.
uprigth.description: The Moon represents illusion, intuition, and the unconscious mind. It suggests that you may be in a period of uncertainty or confusion, where things are not as they seem. The Moon encourages you to trust your intuition and pay attention to the messages from your subconscious. It can indicate that you are facing fears or anxieties, but also that these fears are not based on reality. This card invites you to explore the deeper aspects of your psyche and to navigate through the illusions that may be clouding your perception.

reversed.keywords: Clarity, overcoming fear, truth, illumination, release of illusions.
reversed.advice: Continue to trust your intuition as you move through uncertainty. Clarity is on the horizon, and you are on the path to greater understanding.
reversed.description: Reversed, The Moon can indicate that confusion or uncertainty is lifting. You may be gaining clarity after a period of illusion or fear, and things that were once hidden are now becoming clear. This card suggests that you are beginning to trust your intuition more fully and are moving through your fears. It can also indicate that you are still struggling with illusions or false perceptions, but that you are on the verge of breaking free from them.

uprigth.keywords: Illusion, intuition, fear, anxiety in love.
uprigth.advice: Trust your intuition and navigate any fears or anxieties regarding your love life.
uprigth.description: The Moon represents illusions and uncertainty in love. It may indicate that you are grappling with fears or anxieties that cloud your judgment. This card encourages you to trust your intuition as you navigate these emotional waters. By addressing underlying fears, you can gain clarity and strengthen your relationships.

reversed.keywords: Release of fear, clarity, overcoming illusion.
reversed.advice: Seek clarity and confront any fears that may be influencing your love life.
reversed.description: The reversed Moon suggests that you are beginning to release fears and illusions that have been affecting your love life. Clarity is emerging, allowing you to see relationships more clearly. This card encourages you to embrace this newfound clarity, as it will help you make better choices in love.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is likely to be mysterious, intuitive, and emotionally deep. They may have a strong connection to their subconscious or spiritual side, but could also be secretive or elusive.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with emotional confusion or fear. They could be hiding something, whether from themselves or others, and may need to confront their inner demons.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet them during a time of emotional uncertainty or when you are exploring your subconscious desires. It could happen when you are going through a period of self-reflection or emotional growth.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may meet them during a time of emotional confusion or deception, possibly when you or they are facing fears or illusions.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is deep and intuitive, but it may also be clouded by uncertainty, fears, or illusions. There is a strong emotional pull, yet it’s important to trust your intuition and navigate emotional depths carefully.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: Emotional confusion or deception may be impacting the relationship. One or both partners may be hiding feelings, leading to misunderstandings. Clarity and honesty are needed to bring the relationship back into emotional alignment.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The challenge may be navigating emotional uncertainties, fears, or misunderstandings. Both partners need to communicate clearly and trust their intuition.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: The obstacle could be a lack of clarity or truth, as one or both partners may be hiding their true feelings. Deception or self-delusion could block the connection.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Trust your intuition and embrace your emotional depth. Be willing to explore the unknown parts of yourself, as your soulmate may appear in unexpected ways.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on confronting your own fears or illusions before seeking this connection. Avoid deceiving yourself or others in your quest for love.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the power of intuition and emotional depth. You will learn to trust your inner voice and embrace the mysteries of love.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn the importance of honesty and clarity in relationships. Facing fears and illusions will be central to your growth within this connection.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be emotionally deep and spiritually rich, but both partners need to navigate the uncertainties and trust their instincts.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship could struggle with confusion or deception if clarity is not established. However, it also has the potential for growth if both partners confront their fears together.

name: The Sun (Card 19 in the Major Arcana)

uprigth.keywords: Positivity, success, vitality, joy, abundance, clarity.
uprigth.advice: Embrace the positive energy of The Sun and move forward with confidence. Trust that success and happiness are within your reach.
uprigth.description: The Sun is a card of positivity, success, and vitality. It represents joy, abundance, and a sense of fulfillment. When The Sun appears, it suggests that you are entering a period of happiness and achievement. This card radiates optimism and encourages you to embrace life with confidence and enthusiasm. The Sun also symbolizes clarity and truth. It suggests that any confusion or difficulties you have been experiencing are now clearing up, and you can see your path forward with greater confidence.

reversed.keywords: Setbacks, self-doubt, temporary challenges, lack of joy.
reversed.advice: Reconnect with your sense of optimism and joy. Even in challenging times, remember that happiness and success are still possible.
reversed.description: Reversed, The Sun may indicate temporary setbacks or feelings of self-doubt. You may be experiencing challenges that are clouding your sense of optimism or preventing you from fully embracing the joy in your life. This card suggests that these challenges are temporary, and that by reconnecting with your inner light, you can overcome them. It can also suggest that you are not fully recognizing the success or joy in your life, perhaps because you are focusing too much on what’s missing.

uprigth.keywords: Joy, success, positivity, warmth in love.
uprigth.advice: Embrace the joy and positivity in your love life; celebrate your successes together.
uprigth.description: The Sun signifies joy, success, and positivity in your love life. It suggests that you are in a phase of happiness and fulfillment, where love flourishes. This card encourages you to celebrate the warmth and light that love brings, strengthening your bond with your partner or attracting new love into your life.

reversed.keywords: Temporary setbacks, lack of joy, negativity in love.
reversed.advice: Address any negativity in your love life and work together to restore joy and positivity.
reversed.description: The reversed Sun may indicate temporary setbacks or a lack of joy in your love life. You might be experiencing challenges that cloud your happiness. This card advises you to work together with your partner to address these issues, focusing on restoring positivity and joy in your relationship.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate will be someone who radiates positivity, warmth, and joy. They are likely to be confident, optimistic, and bring a sense of vitality and happiness into your life.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with self-confidence or may not always express their true joy. They could appear reserved or may be working through personal setbacks, trying to find their inner light.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet them during a time of personal joy or success. It could happen when you are feeling confident and happy with yourself, perhaps after achieving a significant goal.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may meet them during a time of personal doubt or when you or they are not fully embracing their true potential. The meeting may come during a period of rediscovering happiness.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is vibrant, joyful, and filled with positive energy. There’s a sense of warmth, trust, and openness between partners, allowing the relationship to thrive in emotional harmony and mutual happiness.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: There may be emotional blockages or a lack of openness in the connection, despite its potential for happiness. Misunderstandings or insecurities could dim the emotional warmth, requiring both partners to reconnect with their authentic feelings.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The challenge may be maintaining positivity and openness in the relationship. Both partners need to embrace joy and not let external factors dim their light.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: The obstacle could be a lack of self-confidence or an inability to fully express happiness. One or both partners may struggle with their own insecurities, which could hinder the relationship.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Embrace positivity and focus on living your life with joy and confidence. Your soulmate will be drawn to your bright energy, so continue to shine your light.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on building your self-confidence and rediscovering your inner joy before seeking this connection. Don’t hide your true self or dim your light for others.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the power of joy and optimism. You will learn to celebrate life together and appreciate the happiness that love can bring.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn the importance of self-confidence and the need to embrace joy fully. Overcoming personal insecurities will be key to the growth of the relationship.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential for great happiness, fulfillment, and shared success. It will bring positivity and light into both partners' lives.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if one or both partners are not fully embracing their happiness. However, it has the potential for growth if personal insecurities are addressed.

name: Judgement (Card 20 in the Major Arcana)

uprigth.keywords: Awakening, reflection, reckoning, transformation, renewal.
uprigth.advice: Reflect on your past and make decisions based on your higher purpose. Embrace transformation and let go of what no longer serves you.
uprigth.description: Judgement is a card of self-reflection, awakening, and transformation. It signifies a time of reckoning, where you are being called to examine your life, choices, and actions. This card often appears when you are at a crossroads, ready to leave the past behind and embrace a new path. It encourages you to make decisions based on your higher self, guided by a sense of clarity and purpose. Judgement is also about spiritual awakening and rebirth. It suggests that you are gaining a deeper understanding of your purpose in life and are being called to rise above past mistakes or regrets.

reversed.keywords: Self-doubt, avoidance, fear of change, guilt, harsh judgment.
reversed.advice: Let go of self-doubt and face important decisions with confidence. Practice forgiveness and self-compassion.
reversed.description: Reversed, Judgement suggests self-doubt, avoidance, or a reluctance to make important decisions. You may be afraid of the changes that are coming or unwilling to face the truth about a situation. This card encourages you to release fear and trust in your ability to make the right choices. It can also indicate that you are being too harsh on yourself or others, leading to feelings of guilt or regret. The reversed Judgement urges you to practice forgiveness and self-compassion.

uprigth.keywords: Reflection, reckoning, awakening, renewal in love.
uprigth.advice: Reflect on your past relationships and learn from them to move forward.
uprigth.description: Judgment signifies reflection and awakening in love. It encourages you to evaluate your past relationships and learn from your experiences. This card indicates a time of renewal, where you can shed old patterns and embrace a new approach to love. If single, it suggests that understanding your past can guide you toward a healthier future.

reversed.keywords: Self-doubt, avoidance of reckoning, feeling stuck in love.
reversed.advice: Confront any self-doubt or unresolved issues to move forward in your love life.
reversed.description: The reversed Judgment card warns of avoiding necessary self-reflection and reckoning in your love life. You may be feeling stuck or hesitant to confront your past. This card encourages you to address these feelings, as doing so will enable you to move forward and create more fulfilling relationships.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate will be someone who is self-aware, reflective, and in touch with their higher purpose. They may have gone through significant personal transformations and are ready for a meaningful connection.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may be struggling with self-doubt or a fear of change. They could be avoiding necessary personal growth or may have unresolved issues from their past.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet them during a time of personal reflection or awakening, possibly when you are making important life decisions. It may be a time when you are re-evaluating your path and making significant changes.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may meet them during a time of personal doubt or confusion, possibly when you or they are avoiding necessary life changes. The meeting could occur when one or both of you are stuck in old patterns.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The relationship is going through an emotional awakening. There’s a sense of clarity and understanding that allows both partners to assess the past and make decisions for the future. Emotional growth and renewal are possible through honest reflection.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: There may be emotional avoidance or a fear of confronting past issues. The connection may feel stagnant or burdened by unresolved emotional baggage, preventing true growth and emotional freedom.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The challenge may be navigating past issues or unresolved karma. Both partners need to confront their pasts and make peace with previous mistakes in order to move forward together.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: The obstacle could be a fear of change or self-reflection. One or both partners may be avoiding the personal growth necessary for the relationship to succeed.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Focus on personal growth and reflection. Be open to making changes in your life and trust that your soulmate will appear when you are ready for a meaningful connection.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on confronting any unresolved issues from your past before seeking this connection. Avoid resisting necessary life changes or staying stuck in old patterns.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about personal growth, self-reflection, and spiritual awakening. You will learn to embrace your higher purpose and make peace with your past.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn the importance of facing personal fears and the need for transformation. The relationship will encourage you to let go of old patterns and embrace change.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential for deep personal growth and spiritual awakening. It will be transformative for both partners and help them align with their higher purpose.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if past issues are not resolved or if personal growth is resisted. However, it has the potential for transformation if both partners are willing to face their fears.

name: The World (Card 21 in the Major Arcana)

uprigth.keywords: Completion, achievement, fulfillment, harmony, travel, expansion.
uprigth.advice: Celebrate your achievements and embrace a sense of fulfillment. Be open to new opportunities and adventures as one cycle ends and another begins.
uprigth.description: The World is the final card in the Major Arcana, symbolizing completion, achievement, and fulfillment. It suggests that you have reached the end of a significant journey or cycle and are now reaping the rewards of your hard work. This card represents a sense of wholeness and harmony, as well as the successful integration of all parts of yourself. The World also signifies travel, expansion, and new opportunities. It encourages you to embrace the sense of completion and to celebrate your achievements, while also looking forward to new adventures and experiences.

reversed.keywords: Unfinished business, lack of closure, delays, stagnation, disconnection.
reversed.advice: Address any unresolved issues and seek closure before moving forward. Reflect on what is holding you back from feeling complete.
reversed.description: Reversed, The World can indicate unfinished business, delays, or a lack of closure. You may feel as though you are stuck or unable to move forward, even though a chapter in your life is coming to an end. This card suggests that you need to address any loose ends or unresolved issues before you can fully embrace the next phase of your journey. It can also suggest that you are feeling disconnected or incomplete, as if something is missing from your life. The reversed World encourages you to seek closure and to reflect on what is holding you back from achieving a sense of fulfillment.

uprigth.keywords: Completion, fulfillment, achievement, harmony in love.
uprigth.advice: Celebrate your achievements in love and embrace the harmony you have created.
uprigth.description: The World signifies completion and fulfillment in your love life. It suggests that you have reached a significant milestone, either within a relationship or in your journey toward finding love. This card encourages you to celebrate your achievements and the harmony you’ve created, recognizing that love is a journey of growth and fulfillment.

reversed.keywords: Incompletion, lack of closure, feeling unfulfilled in love.
reversed.advice: Address any feelings of incompletion or unfulfillment in your love life to find closure and move forward.
reversed.description: The reversed World indicates feelings of incompletion or lack of closure in your love life. You may be holding on to unresolved issues or feeling unfulfilled in a relationship. This card advises you to confront these feelings and seek resolution to create space for new beginnings and fulfillment in love.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate will be someone who has a sense of completeness, maturity, and balance. They are likely to be well-rounded, with a broad perspective on life, and may have achieved significant personal or professional milestones.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may feel incomplete or as though they have unfinished business in their life. They could be seeking closure or struggling to find their place in the world.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet them during a time of personal completion or success, possibly when you have achieved a major goal or milestone. It may happen when you feel whole and fulfilled in your own life.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may meet them during a time of stagnation or when you or they feel something is missing. The timing could occur when one or both of you are seeking closure or trying to finish something important.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection feels complete and fulfilling. Both partners feel secure in the relationship, with a sense of harmony, balance, and mutual achievement. This is a relationship where emotional goals are realized, and there is a shared sense of wholeness.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The emotional connection may feel incomplete or as if something is missing. There could be a lack of closure or a feeling that emotional fulfillment is just out of reach. Efforts are needed to bring the relationship to a sense of completion.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The challenge may be finding balance in the relationship or navigating different life paths. Both partners may need to ensure they are on the same page in terms of life goals and personal fulfillment.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: The obstacle could be a feeling of incompleteness or dissatisfaction in one or both partners. There may be a sense that something is missing or unresolved, which could prevent the relationship from moving forward.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Focus on achieving personal balance and fulfillment. Your soulmate will come into your life when you are whole and complete in yourself, so work on reaching your own milestones.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on finding closure and resolving unfinished business in your life before seeking this connection. Ensure that you feel complete within yourself before entering into a relationship.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about wholeness, balance, and the completion of cycles. You will learn how to achieve personal and relational harmony and how to celebrate shared successes.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn the importance of closure and the need to resolve unfinished business. The relationship will encourage you to seek personal fulfillment and to let go of past issues.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential for great fulfillment, balance, and harmony. It will be a complete and satisfying connection, leading to shared success and happiness.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if there is a sense of incompleteness or unresolved issues. However, it has the potential for fulfillment if both partners work on finding closure and balance.

name: Ace of Pentacles (Card 1 in the Pentacles)

uprigth.keywords: New financial opportunities, prosperity, abundance, stability, manifestation.
uprigth.advice: Embrace new opportunities that could lead to material and financial growth. It's a great time to plant seeds for future abundance.
uprigth.description: The Ace of Pentacles signals the beginning of new financial ventures or opportunities. You might receive a job offer, a new investment opportunity, or a chance to increase your wealth in some way. This card represents prosperity and stability, but it also encourages you to take practical steps toward manifesting your goals. It symbolizes the potential for growth and long-term success, provided you nurture and care for these new beginnings.

reversed.keywords: Missed opportunities, financial loss, lack of planning, instability.
reversed.advice: Reflect on your financial decisions and consider if you’re missing important opportunities. Avoid risky ventures and focus on securing your current situation.
reversed.description: The Ace of Pentacles reversed suggests that there may be missed financial opportunities, or perhaps the timing isn’t right for a new venture. You could be experiencing instability or a sense of lack in your material world. Be careful with new investments or financial commitments. It’s also a sign to review your financial planning and make sure you're setting solid foundations before moving forward.

uprigth.keywords: New beginnings, stability, abundance, potential in love.
uprigth.advice: Embrace new opportunities for stability and growth in your relationship.
uprigth.description: The Ace of Pentacles represents the potential for new beginnings and stability in love. If you are in a relationship, this card suggests that your bond may deepen as you both work towards creating a secure and abundant future. For singles, it symbolizes the opportunity to begin a new, stable relationship with long-term potential. This card encourages you to be open to the possibilities of grounded, nurturing love.

reversed.keywords: Missed opportunities, instability, delays in love.
reversed.advice: Avoid focusing on material concerns that may be hindering your emotional connection.
reversed.description: The reversed Ace of Pentacles may indicate missed opportunities or delays in the stability you seek in love. You may be too focused on material or external factors, causing a disconnect in your relationship. This card advises you to re-evaluate your priorities and focus on nurturing the emotional aspects of your relationship to restore balance.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is practical, grounded, and focused on long-term security. They are likely someone who values stability, hard work, and building a solid foundation in love and life.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with financial or material insecurity. They might be overly focused on wealth or lack of resources, which could impact their approach to relationships.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet your soulmate when you are beginning a new chapter in your career, finances, or personal growth. It may happen during a time of increased financial stability or prosperity.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may meet them during a period of financial difficulty or instability, either for you or them. The timing could come when both of you are seeking security in life.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection feels grounded and secure. There is a sense of potential and growth, with both partners offering stability and a solid foundation. This relationship encourages emotional prosperity and practical support.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The connection may feel unstable or lacking in commitment. There could be missed opportunities for emotional growth, or a focus on material concerns might overshadow the emotional aspect of the relationship.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The obstacle may be an overemphasis on material success or financial security. One or both of you might prioritize career over love, delaying the relationship’s development.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Financial insecurity or fear of losing material wealth could be a barrier. One or both of you might avoid commitment due to concerns about financial stability.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Focus on creating a solid foundation in your life, both financially and emotionally. Stability and security will naturally attract your soulmate into your life.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Don’t allow financial fears to block you from pursuing love. While stability is important, avoid becoming too materialistic or overly focused on wealth in your search for a soulmate.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the importance of stability, patience, and building a secure future together. You will learn that a strong foundation leads to a lasting partnership.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn to balance your need for financial security with emotional fulfillment. The relationship will highlight the need to avoid letting material concerns dominate love.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to bring prosperity, stability, and long-term growth. It may lead to financial success together, as well as a strong emotional connection.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if financial instability or material concerns take precedence over emotional intimacy. However, with effort, it can still grow into something secure.

name: Two of Pentacles (Card 2 in the Pentacles)

uprigth.keywords: Balance, adaptability, multitasking, financial decisions, flexibility.
uprigth.advice: Stay adaptable and manage your priorities with care. It’s important to remain balanced as you juggle multiple responsibilities.
uprigth.description: The Two of Pentacles represents the need to maintain balance while juggling various responsibilities. You may have multiple tasks or projects at hand, especially related to finances or career. This card encourages flexibility and adaptability in managing these commitments. Financial decisions may be at play, and it’s important to stay grounded and organized to avoid being overwhelmed. Focus on maintaining balance, whether it’s between work and home or between different financial obligations.

reversed.keywords: Imbalance, overwhelm, disorganization, financial mismanagement.
reversed.advice: Simplify your life and reduce the number of things you’re trying to juggle. It’s time to focus on what’s truly important and avoid spreading yourself too thin.
reversed.description: The reversed Two of Pentacles warns that you may be struggling to keep everything in balance. You could be taking on too much at once, leading to overwhelm and chaos. Financially, it suggests poor management or lack of attention to important matters. Now is the time to reassess your priorities and reduce the demands on your time and energy. If necessary, ask for help or delegate some of your responsibilities.

uprigth.keywords: Balance, juggling, adaptability, flexibility in love.
uprigth.advice: Strive for balance between love and other areas of your life.
uprigth.description: The Two of Pentacles represents balance and adaptability in relationships. It suggests that you and your partner may be juggling various aspects of life—such as work, family, and love—and finding it challenging to maintain equilibrium. This card encourages you to find a harmonious balance so that your relationship remains strong. If single, it indicates that you may need to better balance your priorities before diving into a new relationship.

reversed.keywords: Overwhelm, imbalance, neglect in love.
reversed.advice: Address any areas of neglect in your relationship and work on restoring balance.
reversed.description: The reversed Two of Pentacles warns of imbalance or overwhelm in your love life. You or your partner may be struggling to keep up with life's demands, leading to neglect in your relationship. This card advises you to re-assess your priorities and focus on bringing balance back into your relationship before problems escalate.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is adaptable, flexible, and good at managing multiple responsibilities. They are likely someone who can balance work, love, and personal life effectively.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with balancing their priorities. They could be overwhelmed by work or life demands, making it hard to focus on the relationship.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet your soulmate when you are juggling multiple responsibilities or going through a period of significant change. It may happen when you learn to balance work, life, and love more effectively.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may meet them when one or both of you are struggling to manage your obligations. The timing could come during a stressful period when balance is difficult to achieve.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional bond is flexible but may require balance. Both partners are juggling responsibilities, but there is an effort to maintain harmony. The relationship thrives when both partners can manage their emotions and practical matters.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The emotional connection feels strained due to a lack of balance. One or both partners may be overwhelmed, leading to neglect of emotional needs. The relationship could suffer from poor prioritization or emotional instability.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The obstacle may be finding time for the relationship. One or both of you might have demanding careers or personal obligations, making it difficult to prioritize love.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Imbalance in life or constant stress could prevent the relationship from developing. One of you may feel overwhelmed and unable to give the necessary attention to love.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Focus on balancing your responsibilities and making space for love in your life. Flexibility and adaptability will help you attract your soulmate and maintain the relationship.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Avoid taking on too much or becoming overwhelmed by work or other obligations. To find your soulmate, you need to make love a priority rather than an afterthought.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the importance of balance and flexibility in life. You will learn how to manage multiple priorities while maintaining a healthy relationship.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn to recognize when you are overburdened and how to create balance. The relationship will highlight the need to avoid letting stress or overwork affect love.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be harmonious if both partners can manage their responsibilities effectively. With balance, it can lead to long-term stability and growth.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face challenges if one or both partners struggle to prioritize love. Overwork or imbalance could lead to strain, but with effort, it can still be restored.

name: Three of Pentacles (Card 3 in the Pentacles)

uprigth.keywords: Collaboration, teamwork, skill development, quality work, recognition.
uprigth.advice: Embrace teamwork and seek support from others. The key to success lies in collaboration and leveraging each person's skills.
uprigth.description: The Three of Pentacles represents teamwork, collaboration, and the importance of working together to achieve common goals. Whether it’s a work project, business venture, or personal goal, you are encouraged to pool resources and talents with others. This card indicates that recognition for your hard work is on the horizon, and it suggests that the quality of your efforts is highly valued. It's also a sign to continue developing your skills and mastering your craft, as this will lead to long-term success.

reversed.keywords: Lack of teamwork, poor planning, lack of skill development, conflict in collaboration.
reversed.advice: Review your current collaborations and see where communication may be lacking. Focus on improving your skills or working more harmoniously with others.
reversed.description: The Three of Pentacles reversed suggests issues in teamwork or collaboration. There may be poor communication, lack of cohesion, or even conflict between those involved in a project. It’s possible that someone isn’t pulling their weight or the goals are not clearly defined. This card calls for a reevaluation of the work environment and a renewed focus on improving skills and communication to ensure everyone is aligned with the same goals.

uprigth.keywords: Collaboration, teamwork, building a solid foundation in love.
uprigth.advice: Work together as a team to build a strong and supportive relationship.
uprigth.description: The Three of Pentacles signifies teamwork and collaboration in relationships. It suggests that you and your partner are working together to build a strong foundation based on mutual respect, communication, and shared goals. This card encourages you to continue collaborating, as your combined efforts will lead to long-term success. For singles, it indicates the potential for a relationship where both parties are willing to work together to create something meaningful.

reversed.keywords: Lack of teamwork, miscommunication, unequal effort in love.
reversed.advice: Address any lack of collaboration in your relationship and strive for better communication.
reversed.description: The reversed Three of Pentacles may indicate miscommunication or a lack of collaboration in your relationship. One partner may be putting in more effort than the other, leading to frustration and imbalance. This card advises you to have an open conversation with your partner about the dynamics of the relationship and work together to restore harmony.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is cooperative, hardworking, and values teamwork. They are likely someone who appreciates working together to build a strong foundation for the future.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with collaboration or teamwork. They could be someone who has difficulty compromising or working with others, which might cause friction in the relationship.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet your soulmate during a collaborative effort, such as a work project, shared goal, or team environment. The meeting may happen while you're both focused on building something together.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may meet them during a time when cooperation and teamwork are difficult. The timing could come when one or both of you are struggling with collaboration or managing different responsibilities.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is based on teamwork and mutual respect. Both partners contribute to the growth of the relationship, working together to build a strong emotional foundation. There is a sense of collaboration and shared goals.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: There may be a lack of cooperation or appreciation in the relationship. One or both partners could feel unsupported emotionally, leading to frustration or a feeling of imbalance in contributions.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The obstacle may be the need for more collaboration in the relationship. One or both of you might struggle with working together or communicating effectively about shared goals.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Lack of cooperation or unwillingness to work together could be a major obstacle. The relationship may suffer if one or both of you are too focused on individual goals instead of shared progress.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Be open to working together with others and building relationships based on mutual goals and collaboration. Your soulmate will likely be drawn to your ability to create and build something meaningful together.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Focus on improving your communication and teamwork skills. Avoid being overly independent or resistant to working with others if you want to attract your soulmate.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the importance of collaboration, teamwork, and building a strong foundation together. You will learn how to grow and accomplish goals as a team.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn the value of compromise and collaboration. The relationship may reveal the importance of working through differences to achieve shared success.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential for growth and success, particularly if both partners are willing to work together toward shared goals. It can lead to long-term stability and fulfillment.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face challenges if collaboration is lacking. However, with effort and a willingness to work together, it can still develop into a stable partnership.

name: Four of Pentacles (Card 4 in the Pentacles)

uprigth.keywords: Security, stability, material wealth, conservatism, control.
uprigth.advice: It’s time to build a solid foundation for your financial future, but be cautious about holding on too tightly. Balance saving with generosity.
uprigth.description: The Four of Pentacles represents financial stability and the desire to protect and control your resources. You may be focused on saving, conserving wealth, and maintaining security, but there’s a caution against becoming overly attached to material possessions. This card encourages you to seek balance between saving and spending, as well as being open to generosity. While it’s good to secure your future, there is also a need to avoid becoming too rigid or resistant to change.

reversed.keywords: Greed, materialism, financial loss, lack of control, insecurity.
reversed.advice: Reflect on whether you are holding on too tightly to your resources. Consider letting go of fear and finding a healthier balance between security and flexibility.
reversed.description: The Four of Pentacles reversed suggests that you may be holding on too tightly to money or material possessions, leading to feelings of insecurity. You could be driven by fear of loss or financial instability, which could result in greed or materialism. Alternatively, it may indicate that you are loosening your grip and becoming more open to sharing your wealth. The card advises that now is a time to find balance—don't let the fear of losing control consume you.

uprigth.keywords: Security, stability, possessiveness, control in love.
uprigth.advice: Ensure that your need for security doesn't turn into possessiveness or control in the relationship.
uprigth.description: The Four of Pentacles represents a desire for security and stability in love. While this can be positive, the card also warns against becoming too possessive or controlling in your relationship. It encourages you to strike a balance between maintaining stability and allowing room for freedom and growth. If single, it suggests that you may need to release any fears of vulnerability before opening up to love.

reversed.keywords: Insecurity, greed, letting go of control in love.
reversed.advice: Release the need for control in your relationship and trust in the bond you have built.
reversed.description: The reversed Four of Pentacles may indicate insecurity or a fear of losing control in your love life. You or your partner may be holding on too tightly, creating a stifling dynamic. This card advises you to release control and trust that your relationship can thrive without constant oversight. Letting go will allow for a healthier and more open connection.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is likely someone who values security, stability, and financial control. They may be conservative or cautious when it comes to their resources, both emotional and material.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may be possessive or overly protective, fearing loss or lack of control. They could struggle with letting go or being too attached to security, even at the cost of emotional connection.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet your soulmate when you or they are focused on securing stability or consolidating resources. It may happen during a time of financial planning or concern for the future.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may meet them during a time when there is fear of loss or financial instability. The timing could come when one or both of you are holding onto resources tightly or struggling with control.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection feels protective but possibly possessive. There is a desire to hold on tightly to the relationship, which can provide security but also create emotional constraints. It’s important to allow room for emotional growth.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may feel emotionally stifling due to control or fear of vulnerability. One or both partners may struggle with letting go of emotional baggage, leading to closed-off feelings and a lack of emotional openness.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The obstacle may be a tendency to hold on too tightly to financial or emotional security. One or both of you may be overly cautious or unwilling to take risks in love.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Possessiveness or fear of loss may become a barrier to the relationship. One or both of you might struggle with letting go of control, which can prevent emotional openness.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Focus on creating emotional and financial stability in your life, but avoid becoming too attached to security. Be open to new experiences and trust that love will come when you’re ready.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Let go of the need for control and allow yourself to be vulnerable in love. Focusing too much on security can block emotional connection, so be willing to take a chance on love.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the balance between security and emotional openness. You will learn the importance of sharing resources and being flexible while still maintaining stability.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn to let go of possessiveness and the need for control. The relationship may help you understand that love requires trust and emotional vulnerability, not just security.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential for long-term stability if both partners can balance security with emotional openness. It can lead to a secure and fulfilling partnership.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if possessiveness or control becomes an issue. However, with effort and trust, it can still grow into a balanced and emotionally fulfilling connection.

name: Five of Pentacles (Card 5 in the Pentacles)

uprigth.keywords: Hardship, financial loss, poverty, insecurity, isolation.
uprigth.advice: Seek support if you’re going through a challenging time. Remember that this phase will pass, and you don’t have to go through it alone.
uprigth.description: The Five of Pentacles often symbolizes hardship, particularly in the material or financial realm. You may be experiencing financial loss, instability, or a sense of isolation. This card reflects a time of struggle, but it also reminds you that help is available if you’re willing to reach out. While this is a difficult phase, it is not permanent. The Five of Pentacles encourages you to stay hopeful and seek assistance from others during tough times.

reversed.keywords: Recovery, improvement, renewed hope, financial stability.
reversed.advice: Your situation is improving, but take care to rebuild slowly and wisely. Don’t be afraid to ask for help along the way.
reversed.description: The Five of Pentacles reversed indicates that you are moving out of a period of hardship or financial difficulty. Recovery is in sight, and there is a renewed sense of hope for the future. You may have found support or resources to help you regain stability, or you’re beginning to see the light at the end of the tunnel. Now is the time to focus on rebuilding your finances or personal security, and take steady steps toward a better future.

uprigth.keywords: Hardship, struggle, feeling abandoned, lack of support in love.
uprigth.advice: Seek support from your partner during difficult times, and offer it in return.
uprigth.description: The Five of Pentacles represents feelings of struggle, isolation, or hardship in love. You or your partner may be going through a tough time and feeling unsupported or disconnected. This card encourages you to lean on each other during difficult moments, recognizing that support is crucial in overcoming challenges. For singles, it may indicate a period of emotional or financial difficulty that is affecting your ability to connect with others.

reversed.keywords: Recovery, hope, rebuilding connection in love.
reversed.advice: Focus on rebuilding trust and support in your relationship to overcome past hardships.
reversed.description: The reversed Five of Pentacles suggests that you are moving toward recovery and healing in your love life. If you've faced difficulties or disconnection, this card indicates that hope is on the horizon. It encourages you to rebuild trust and emotional support with your partner, working together to move beyond past challenges. For singles, it signifies a time of healing before opening up to new romantic possibilities.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate may have gone through hardship, financial struggles, or emotional isolation. They are resilient and understand the value of support during difficult times.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may be someone who has difficulty accepting help or is recovering from past struggles. They may have a fear of vulnerability or rejection based on their past experiences.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet your soulmate during a challenging period in life, possibly when one or both of you are dealing with financial or emotional hardship. The meeting may come when support and understanding are most needed.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may meet them after a period of healing from financial or emotional difficulties. The timing could come when one or both of you have emerged from hardship but still feel cautious about love.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection may feel challenged, with both partners experiencing feelings of loss or abandonment. However, there is an opportunity to support each other during difficult times, fostering resilience and emotional solidarity.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may be struggling to overcome emotional setbacks. One or both partners could feel isolated or unsupported, leading to emotional disconnection. There’s a need to address emotional wounds to rebuild trust and connection.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The obstacle could be feelings of insecurity or fear of rejection. One or both of you may struggle with feelings of inadequacy or fear of being left out in the cold.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Fear of vulnerability or emotional openness may be an obstacle. One or both of you could be recovering from past pain and may find it difficult to fully trust and open up.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Stay open to connection, even during difficult times. Your soulmate may appear when you least expect it, offering support and understanding when you need it most.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Allow yourself to heal and move past feelings of insecurity or fear. Be open to love, even if you’ve been hurt in the past, and trust that your soulmate will bring healing and support.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about resilience, support, and the strength of love during tough times. You will learn that true connection is about being there for each other, even in hardship.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn the importance of healing and letting go of past pain. This relationship may help you overcome feelings of rejection or insecurity, showing you that love can heal old wounds.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be deeply supportive and healing, especially if both partners are willing to be vulnerable and offer each other emotional and practical support.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face challenges if emotional barriers or past pain are not addressed. However, with effort and understanding, it can grow into a nurturing and supportive partnership.

name: Six of Pentacles (Card 6 in the Pentacles)

uprigth.keywords: Generosity, charity, sharing wealth, giving and receiving, balance.
uprigth.advice: Be generous if you have the means, but also remain open to receiving help when you need it. Balance is key in the exchange of resources.
uprigth.description: The Six of Pentacles represents generosity and the flow of wealth between those who have and those in need. You may find yourself in a position to give to others, whether financially, emotionally, or through other resources. It’s a card of balance—what you give will come back to you in some way. If you’re the one in need, don’t hesitate to accept help when it’s offered. The Six of Pentacles encourages a healthy exchange and flow of resources, ensuring that both giving and receiving are done with balance and fairness.

reversed.keywords: Selfishness, stinginess, dependency, imbalance in giving.
reversed.advice: Consider if you are giving too much or too little. Ensure that you are not being taken advantage of or being overly possessive of your resources.
reversed.description: The Six of Pentacles reversed suggests an imbalance in giving and receiving. You might be either giving too much to others without receiving anything in return, or withholding generosity out of fear or selfishness. It can also indicate dependency—either you are relying too much on others, or someone else is relying too much on you. The card advises you to review your relationships and financial exchanges, ensuring that they are fair and balanced.

uprigth.keywords: Generosity, balance, giving and receiving in love.
uprigth.advice: Strive for a balanced exchange of love, care, and support in your relationship.
uprigth.description: The Six of Pentacles represents balance in the exchange of love and support. It suggests that both you and your partner are giving and receiving in equal measure, creating a harmonious and nurturing dynamic. This card encourages generosity and mutual care in your relationship. If single, it indicates that being open and giving will attract the same energy from a potential partner.

reversed.keywords: Imbalance, selfishness, one-sided effort in love.
reversed.advice: Address any imbalance in your relationship to ensure that both partners are contributing equally.
reversed.description: The reversed Six of Pentacles warns of an imbalance in your relationship, where one partner may be giving more than the other. This card advises you to have an honest conversation with your partner about the effort each of you is putting into the relationship. It’s important to ensure that both sides are contributing equally to maintain harmony.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is generous, kind, and values balance in giving and receiving. They may be someone who enjoys helping others and seeks a relationship where support is mutual.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with balance in giving or receiving. They might be overly generous to the point of self-sacrifice or, conversely, have difficulty accepting help from others.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet your soulmate during a time of giving or receiving support. This could happen in a charitable setting, during a time of mutual assistance, or when one or both of you are focused on helping others.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may meet them during a time of imbalance in your life, either when you’re giving too much without receiving, or vice versa. The meeting may occur when you’re learning to find balance in relationships.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is generous and balanced. Both partners give and receive emotional support equally, creating a sense of fairness and harmony. There is a willingness to share and nurture the relationship emotionally.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may feel one-sided emotionally, with one partner giving more than the other. This imbalance could lead to resentment or feelings of being taken for granted. Emotional reciprocity is needed to restore harmony.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The obstacle may be a lack of balance in giving and receiving. One or both of you might struggle with maintaining equality in the relationship, either by giving too much or too little.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Imbalance in generosity may become a barrier. One person may feel like they’re doing all the giving while the other struggles to reciprocate, leading to feelings of inequality.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Focus on balance in your relationships. Be open to both giving and receiving, and allow your soulmate to meet you halfway. Generosity is important, but so is fairness and mutual respect.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on finding balance in your life before seeking your soulmate. Avoid situations where you’re giving too much without receiving, and be open to accepting help when it’s offered.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the value of balance and reciprocity. You will learn that healthy love involves equal giving and receiving, and that generosity is a two-way street.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn the importance of boundaries and balance in love. This relationship may challenge you to find a healthy equilibrium between giving and receiving, and to avoid self-sacrifice.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be generous and mutually supportive, leading to a balanced and harmonious partnership. With both partners willing to give and receive equally, it can thrive.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face challenges if the balance of giving and receiving isn’t addressed. However, with effort, it can still grow into a more balanced and fulfilling connection.

name: Seven of Pentacles (Card 7 in the Pentacles)

uprigth.keywords: Patience, long-term planning, perseverance, investment, reflection.
uprigth.advice: Take a step back and evaluate your progress. You’re on the right path, but patience and persistence are needed to see the fruits of your labor.
uprigth.description: The Seven of Pentacles is a card of patience and long-term growth. You have put in significant effort, and now it’s time to assess your progress and see if your work is paying off. It may feel like results are slow, but this card encourages perseverance. It’s also a reminder that success doesn’t come overnight; careful planning and dedication are necessary to achieve your long-term goals. Whether it’s financial, career, or personal matters, trust that your efforts will eventually bear fruit, even if it takes time.

reversed.keywords: Impatience, lack of progress, poor planning, frustration.
reversed.advice: Reevaluate your approach and make adjustments if needed. Avoid rushing the process, and ensure that your efforts are focused on the right goals.
reversed.description: The Seven of Pentacles reversed suggests frustration with slow progress or dissatisfaction with results. You may feel like your hard work is not yielding the outcomes you hoped for, leading to impatience or discouragement. It’s possible that poor planning or misaligned efforts are causing delays. This card advises you to reassess your strategies and ensure you’re investing time and energy into the right areas. Patience is still important, but if something isn’t working, it might be time to pivot or rethink your approach.

reversed.keywords: Patience, investment, long-term growth in love.
reversed.advice: Be patient and continue investing in your relationship to see it grow and thrive.
reversed.description: The Seven of Pentacles symbolizes long-term investment and growth in love. It suggests that you have been putting in effort and care into your relationship, and while results may not be immediate, your patience will pay off in the long run. This card encourages you to remain committed to nurturing your relationship, knowing that lasting love takes time to grow. If single, it indicates that patience is needed as you work towards attracting the right partner.

uprigth.keywords: Frustration, impatience, lack of progress in love.
uprigth.advice: Frustration, impatience, lack of progress in love.
uprigth.description: The reversed Seven of Pentacles suggests feelings of frustration or impatience with the progress of your relationship. You may be questioning whether your efforts are worth it or if things are moving too slowly. This card advises you to avoid making hasty decisions or giving up prematurely. Relationships take time to develop, and patience is key to seeing the fruits of your labor.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is patient, hardworking, and values long-term commitment. They are someone who invests time and effort into their relationships, seeking growth and stability.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with impatience or feeling unfulfilled. They might have difficulty waiting for things to develop or may feel frustrated if they don’t see immediate results.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet your soulmate during a time of waiting or after a period of personal growth. This could happen when you’ve been focused on your long-term goals or investments in yourself.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may meet them during a time of frustration or impatience, possibly when you or they are questioning whether their efforts in life or love are paying off.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection requires patience and nurturing. Both partners are investing in the relationship, waiting for emotional growth and rewards. This is a time of reflection and commitment to long-term emotional stability.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may feel stagnant or unfulfilling. One or both partners could be questioning whether their emotional investment is paying off, leading to frustration or doubt. There’s a need to reassess emotional priorities.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The obstacle could be impatience or a tendency to focus too much on long-term results, leading to dissatisfaction in the present. One or both of you may struggle with enjoying the journey.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Impatience or frustration may become a barrier. One or both of you may give up too easily or feel discouraged when things don’t progress quickly.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Be patient and trust that your efforts in love will pay off. Your soulmate will come into your life when the time is right, and the relationship will be worth the wait.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Avoid rushing the process of finding love. Let things develop naturally and don’t force the timing. Trust that your soulmate will appear when both of you are ready.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about patience, growth, and the value of investing in love over the long term. You will learn that meaningful relationships take time and effort to develop.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You will learn the importance of perseverance and not giving up too soon. This relationship may challenge you to let go of impatience and focus on the journey rather than just the results.
