OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential for deep emotional healing and a renewed sense of hope and love.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if past issues remain unresolved, but it can grow stronger through communication and healing.

name: Six of Cups (Card 6 in the Cups)

uprigth.keywords: Nostalgia, childhood memories, innocence, joy, kindness.
uprigth.advice: Take time to connect with your past, whether through memories, people, or activities that bring joy and comfort. Embrace innocence and kindness.
uprigth.description: The Six of Cups represents nostalgia, memories of childhood, and the joy of simpler times. It often indicates reconnecting with your past, whether through old friends, family, or revisiting places that hold sentimental value. This card encourages you to embrace kindness, innocence, and joy, and to give and receive love openly. The Six of Cups also suggests that you may be reminiscing about a time when life felt more carefree, and it reminds you that happiness can be found in the present by reconnecting with those positive memories.

reversed.keywords: Stuck in the past, difficulty moving on, unrealistic nostalgia, healing old wounds.
reversed.advice: Reflect on whether you are holding on too tightly to the past. It may be time to let go and focus on living in the present.
reversed.description: The Six of Cups reversed suggests that you may be overly focused on the past, and it’s preventing you from moving forward. You could be clinging to memories, idealizing a time that is no longer relevant, or feeling stuck in a place of nostalgia. The reversal encourages you to work on healing any emotional wounds related to your past and to let go of unrealistic expectations about reliving those moments. It’s time to release the hold that the past has on you and start creating new memories and experiences in the present.

uprigth.keywords: Nostalgia, reunion, childhood memories, innocence.
uprigth.advice: Embrace the joy of reconnecting with the past but remain grounded in the present.
uprigth.description: The Six of Cups often represents nostalgia or the reemergence of past relationships. It can indicate a reunion with an old flame or a relationship that carries a sense of innocence and joy. This card brings emotional fulfillment by revisiting happy memories or rekindling past connections. For singles, it suggests that someone from your past may come back into your life, offering a chance to reconnect and possibly rekindle a romance.

reversed.keywords: Letting go of the past, maturity, emotional growth.
reversed.advice: Release attachments to past relationships that no longer serve you. Focus on emotional growth and the future.
reversed.description: The reversed Six of Cups indicates a need to let go of past relationships or emotional experiences that may be holding you back. You may be clinging to an idealized version of the past, but this card encourages you to focus on personal growth and maturity. In a relationship, it suggests that unresolved issues from the past are affecting your current emotional well-being. For singles, it indicates that it’s time to move on from past loves and embrace new possibilities.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate embodies nostalgia and innocence, bringing warmth and kindness to relationships. They may remind you of your childhood or bring joy.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may have difficulty letting go of the past or may struggle with adult responsibilities, affecting emotional maturity.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate in a place tied to happy memories or through mutual friends from your past.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when you are reflecting on past relationships or trying to heal from childhood issues.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is nostalgic and rooted in past experiences. Both partners may feel a deep emotional bond based on shared memories or a sense of familiarity.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may be stuck in the past, with one or both partners unable to move forward emotionally. There could be emotional immaturity or a refusal to let go of past issues.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may include idealizing the past or not fully engaging in the present relationship.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could arise from clinging to old memories or unresolved issues from childhood.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Embrace joy and kindness, and be open to connecting with others in a light-hearted way.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on resolving past issues and focus on being present in your current relationships.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the beauty of innocence and the value of shared memories.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to confront and heal from past wounds that affect your ability to love.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship holds the potential for warmth, kindness, and a deep emotional connection rooted in shared experiences.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if past issues remain unaddressed, but it can flourish through healing and understanding.

name: Seven of Cups (Card 7 in the Cups)

uprigth.keywords: Choices, illusions, wishful thinking, fantasy, confusion.
uprigth.advice: Be mindful of the options presented to you, and take care to discern between fantasy and reality. Focus on what is truly achievable.
uprigth.description: The Seven of Cups represents choices, possibilities, and often illusions. This card suggests that you are faced with many options, but not all of them are realistic or beneficial. It’s a card of wishful thinking and imagination, where you may be caught up in fantasies or tempted by things that seem too good to be true. The Seven of Cups encourages you to carefully evaluate your choices, focusing on what aligns with your goals and values. It warns you to avoid distractions or unrealistic expectations and to make decisions based on clarity and practicality.

reversed.keywords: Clarity, realism, narrowing down options, grounded decisions.
reversed.advice: You are beginning to see things more clearly and are ready to make grounded, realistic decisions. Trust your judgment.
reversed.description: The Seven of Cups reversed suggests that you are moving away from confusion and fantasy, gaining clarity on what is important to you. You may have been overwhelmed by too many choices or caught up in unrealistic expectations, but now you are ready to make decisions that are grounded in reality. The reversal indicates that you have a better understanding of what is achievable and are focusing on concrete goals. It’s a time to narrow down your options and take action on what truly matters.

uprigth.keywords: Choices, fantasy, illusions, indecision.
uprigth.advice: Avoid being swept away by illusions or unrealistic expectations. Take time to evaluate your options clearly.
uprigth.description: The Seven of Cups represents emotional confusion or being overwhelmed by choices in love. You or your partner may be struggling to distinguish between fantasy and reality, leading to indecision or unrealistic expectations. This card encourages you to ground yourself in reality and carefully evaluate your emotional desires. For singles, the Seven of Cups indicates that you may have many romantic options but must be mindful of which ones are genuinely aligned with your true needs.

reversed.keywords: Clarity, decisive action, grounding.
reversed.advice: Focus on what is real and achievable in your love life. Ground yourself in reality before making choices.
reversed.description: The reversed Seven of Cups brings clarity and the ability to make decisions based on reality rather than fantasy. You or your partner may be gaining a clearer understanding of your emotional needs and can now act decisively in the relationship. For singles, it suggests that you are beginning to see through illusions and are now ready to make grounded choices in love, avoiding unrealistic expectations.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is imaginative and creative, often full of dreams and aspirations. They may have many interests and sometimes struggle with indecision.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may be someone who feels overwhelmed by choices or has a tendency to escape reality. They might have difficulty focusing on what truly matters.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of exploration or when pursuing your dreams, perhaps at a creative event or a place filled with inspiration.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when you are feeling lost or disillusioned, possibly while trying to navigate through life’s choices.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection may feel uncertain or clouded by illusions. One or both partners may struggle with emotional clarity, making it difficult to fully understand each other’s feelings.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship has the potential for emotional clarity after a period of confusion. Both partners may begin to see each other’s emotions more clearly, allowing for a more grounded connection.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may stem from unrealistic expectations or being caught up in fantasies rather than engaging in reality.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could arise from confusion or a lack of clarity about your desires, making it difficult to commit to the relationship.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Stay grounded and be clear about your values and desires. Embrace your creativity while being realistic about your goals in love.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Focus on prioritizing what truly matters in your life and relationships. Avoid getting lost in illusions or distractions.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the importance of balance between dreams and reality, encouraging you to manifest your aspirations with clarity.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to confront your fears and uncertainties, helping you to make clearer choices in love and life.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential for deep emotional exploration and mutual support in pursuing dreams, fostering a shared vision for the future.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if fantasies overshadow reality, but it can strengthen through honest communication and mutual understanding.

name: Eight of Cups (Card 8 in the Cups)

uprigth.keywords: Walking away, seeking truth, emotional detachment, leaving behind.
uprigth.advice: It’s time to leave behind what no longer serves you. Trust your instincts and seek greater emotional or spiritual fulfillment elsewhere.
uprigth.description: The Eight of Cups signifies the decision to walk away from a situation that is no longer emotionally fulfilling. Whether it’s a relationship, job, or lifestyle, this card suggests that you are ready to move on in search of deeper meaning or greater personal fulfillment. The Eight of Cups encourages you to trust your inner wisdom and leave behind what no longer serves your growth. It’s a card of emotional detachment, where you are seeking a more meaningful experience, even if it means letting go of something familiar.

reversed.keywords: Fear of change, stagnation, inability to move on, clinging to the past.
reversed.advice: Reflect on what is holding you back from moving forward. You may need to confront your fears and embrace change.
reversed.description: The Eight of Cups reversed suggests that you may be struggling to let go of a situation that is no longer fulfilling, even though you know it’s time to move on. Fear of change or uncertainty about the future could be keeping you stuck in a place of emotional stagnation. The reversal encourages you to confront your fears and take the necessary steps to move forward. It’s a reminder that personal growth often requires leaving behind what is comfortable but no longer beneficial.

uprigth.keywords: Walking away, emotional withdrawal, abandonment, seeking truth.
uprigth.advice: Trust your instincts if you feel the need to walk away from a situation that no longer fulfills you emotionally.
uprigth.description: The Eight of Cups signifies the need to leave behind something that no longer brings emotional fulfillment. Whether it's a relationship or emotional pattern, this card suggests that you or your partner may feel the need to seek something deeper and more meaningful. For singles, it may indicate that you are walking away from past emotional disappointments or leaving behind unfulfilling relationships in search of greater emotional satisfaction.

reversed.keywords: Avoidance, fear of change, emotional stagnation.
reversed.advice: Confront the issues you are avoiding. Don’t stay in a situation out of fear of the unknown.
reversed.description: The reversed Eight of Cups suggests a fear of walking away from an unfulfilling relationship or emotional situation. You may feel stuck in a relationship out of fear of change or the unknown. This card encourages you to confront the emotional stagnation and take the necessary steps toward healing. For singles, it may indicate a reluctance to leave behind past emotional baggage, which is preventing you from finding new love.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is someone who values emotional depth and is willing to make sacrifices for their personal growth. They may be introspective and thoughtful.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may have difficulty committing to relationships or may struggle with unresolved emotional issues, impacting their ability to connect deeply.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of emotional exploration or while seeking deeper meaning in your life, perhaps after leaving behind what no longer serves you.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when grappling with your own feelings of dissatisfaction or avoidance of emotional challenges.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection may feel unfulfilling, prompting one or both partners to seek emotional growth elsewhere. There is a sense of emotional detachment or a desire to move on from the relationship.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional stagnation or a refusal to let go of past issues. Both partners may feel emotionally stuck, unable to move forward or release emotional baggage.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may stem from emotional baggage or the fear of leaving behind familiar but unfulfilling situations.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could arise from a reluctance to face emotional truths or an inability to move on from past wounds.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Embrace your journey of self-discovery and be open to letting go of what no longer serves you. Trust that finding your soulmate requires personal growth.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on addressing any unresolved emotional issues that may hinder your ability to fully engage in a new relationship.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the value of emotional exploration and the importance of pursuing your own happiness.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to confront feelings of dissatisfaction and discover what truly fulfills you in love.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship holds the potential for emotional depth and growth, encouraging both partners to seek fulfillment together.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face challenges if emotional avoidance prevails, but it can thrive through mutual understanding and honesty.

name: Nine of Cups (Card 9 in the Cups)

uprigth.keywords: Contentment, satisfaction, emotional fulfillment, wishes come true.
uprigth.advice: Enjoy the emotional abundance you’ve achieved. Take pride in your accomplishments and the fulfillment of your desires.
uprigth.description: The Nine of Cups is often referred to as the 'wish card,' symbolizing emotional fulfillment, satisfaction, and contentment. It suggests that your wishes are coming true, and you are experiencing joy and abundance in your life. This card indicates a time of emotional balance, where you feel confident and proud of what you have achieved. The Nine of Cups encourages you to enjoy the moment, celebrate your successes, and appreciate the love and happiness that surrounds you.

reversed.keywords: Discontent, greed, lack of fulfillment, superficial happiness.
reversed.advice: Reflect on whether your emotional needs are truly being met. Superficial gains may not bring lasting satisfaction.
reversed.description: The Nine of Cups reversed suggests that while you may have achieved external success or material wealth, you are still feeling emotionally unfulfilled. You could be chasing after superficial pleasures or focusing too much on personal gratification, neglecting deeper emotional needs. The reversal encourages you to reassess what truly brings you happiness and to seek emotional fulfillment that goes beyond surface-level desires. It’s a reminder that contentment comes from within, and external achievements alone may not provide lasting satisfaction.

uprigth.keywords: Emotional satisfaction, contentment, joy, fulfillment.
uprigth.advice: Enjoy the emotional fulfillment that comes from love. Appreciate the joy in your relationship.
uprigth.description: The Nine of Cups is a card of emotional satisfaction and contentment. In a relationship, it signifies a period of joy and fulfillment where your emotional needs are being met. This card represents emotional harmony and the achievement of a deep connection with your partner. For singles, the Nine of Cups indicates a time of emotional independence and self-fulfillment, where you are content with yourself and open to love from a place of inner peace.

reversed.keywords: Dissatisfaction, lack of emotional fulfillment, overindulgence.
reversed.advice: Address the areas in your relationship where emotional fulfillment is lacking. Avoid seeking emotional satisfaction from unhealthy sources.
reversed.description: The reversed Nine of Cups suggests a lack of emotional fulfillment or dissatisfaction in your relationship. You or your partner may feel that something is missing emotionally, even if everything seems perfect on the surface. This card encourages you to address any emotional gaps and avoid overindulgence or seeking fulfillment from unhealthy sources. For singles, it may indicate a temporary sense of emotional dissatisfaction, urging you to look within for fulfillment.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is someone who values emotional depth and is willing to make sacrifices for their personal growth. They may be introspective and thoughtful.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may have difficulty committing to relationships or may struggle with unresolved emotional issues, impacting their ability to connect deeply.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of emotional exploration or while seeking deeper meaning in your life, perhaps after leaving behind what no longer serves you.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when grappling with your own feelings of dissatisfaction or avoidance of emotional challenges.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is fulfilling and emotionally satisfying. Both partners feel content and emotionally secure in the relationship, creating a sense of emotional abundance and happiness.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional dissatisfaction or overindulgence. One or both partners may feel emotionally unfulfilled despite external appearances of happiness.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may stem from emotional baggage or the fear of leaving behind familiar but unfulfilling situations.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could arise from a reluctance to face emotional truths or an inability to move on from past wounds.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Embrace your journey of self-discovery and be open to letting go of what no longer serves you. Trust that finding your soulmate requires personal growth.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on addressing any unresolved emotional issues that may hinder your ability to fully engage in a new relationship.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the value of emotional exploration and the importance of pursuing your own happiness.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to confront feelings of dissatisfaction and discover what truly fulfills you in love.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship holds the potential for emotional depth and growth, encouraging both partners to seek fulfillment together.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face challenges if emotional avoidance prevails, but it can thrive through mutual understanding and honesty.

name: Ten of Cups (Card 10 in the Cups)

uprigth.keywords: Happiness, harmony, emotional fulfillment, family, lasting success.
uprigth.advice: Enjoy the emotional harmony in your life, particularly with loved ones. Embrace moments of joy and nurture the positive connections in your relationships.
uprigth.description: The Ten of Cups represents ultimate happiness, emotional fulfillment, and harmony within relationships, especially family or close loved ones. This card often signifies that you have found emotional contentment and a deep sense of connection with others. Whether through family, friends, or community, the Ten of Cups encourages you to appreciate and cherish the love and support that surrounds you. It’s a card of lasting emotional success, symbolizing the achievement of a balanced and fulfilling life. It can also indicate happy endings, long-term commitments, and dreams coming true.

reversed.keywords: Misaligned values, relationship strain, emotional disconnection, tension.
reversed.advice: Take time to reflect on any emotional discord in your relationships. Communication and understanding are needed to realign with those you care about.
reversed.description: The Ten of Cups reversed suggests that there may be emotional tension or discord within your relationships, particularly with family or close partners. This card indicates that while there is potential for happiness and harmony, there may be unresolved issues or misaligned values that are causing strain. The reversal encourages you to address these problems head-on, focusing on open communication and mutual understanding to rebuild emotional harmony. It’s a reminder that lasting happiness comes from nurturing relationships with care and attention.

uprigth.keywords: Emotional harmony, family, happiness, long-term relationships.
uprigth.advice: Cherish the emotional harmony and joy in your relationships. Focus on long-term emotional fulfillment.
uprigth.description: The Ten of Cups represents emotional harmony and long-term happiness in relationships. This card often indicates a fulfilling family life or a deep, long-lasting connection with a partner. It symbolizes emotional completion and the joy that comes from shared love and happiness. For singles, the Ten of Cups suggests the potential for a future relationship that brings emotional fulfillment and a sense of lasting happiness.

reversed.keywords: Family conflict, emotional disharmony, broken relationships.
reversed.advice: Work on resolving emotional conflicts and focus on healing the relationship. Rebuild the emotional foundation.
reversed.description: The reversed Ten of Cups warns of emotional disharmony or conflict within a family or relationship. There may be unresolved issues that are causing a breakdown in emotional connection. This card encourages you to address these issues and work on healing the relationship to restore emotional harmony. For singles, it suggests that emotional fulfillment may be delayed, and it’s essential to work on personal emotional healing before entering a new relationship.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate embodies emotional fulfillment and joy, often prioritizing harmony in relationships. They are likely to be nurturing and committed to family and community.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with discontent or emotional disconnect, possibly feeling unsatisfied in their relationships or family life.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of emotional happiness or family gatherings, perhaps while celebrating significant life events.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when experiencing emotional upheaval or when navigating family dynamics that feel unbalanced.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is deeply fulfilling and harmonious. Both partners feel a strong emotional bond, with a shared sense of emotional contentment and long-term happiness.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may be experiencing emotional instability or disharmony. There could be underlying emotional issues that disrupt the sense of emotional fulfillment in the relationship.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from external pressures or unrealistic expectations about relationships and family life.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from unresolved family issues or a lack of emotional support that affects your connection.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Focus on building a supportive and harmonious environment, as this will attract your soulmate. Be open to emotional connections and community involvement.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on addressing any family or emotional issues that may hinder your ability to connect deeply with others.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the importance of emotional support and the joy of building a family or community together.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to confront and heal family wounds, understanding how they impact your relationships.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential for deep emotional fulfillment and happiness, creating a loving and supportive partnership.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face challenges if emotional needs are not addressed, but it can grow stronger through mutual understanding and commitment.

name: Page of Cups (Card 11 in the Cups)

uprigth.keywords: Creativity, intuition, emotional openness, new opportunities in love or relationships.
uprigth.advice: Follow your heart and be open to new emotional experiences or creative inspirations. Trust your intuition to guide you toward new opportunities.
uprigth.description: The Page of Cups represents emotional openness, creativity, and the potential for new beginnings, especially in love and relationships. This card encourages you to embrace your intuition and explore the emotional or creative opportunities that present themselves. The Page of Cups is often a sign of new love, emotional connections, or creative inspiration coming into your life. It invites you to stay open-hearted, playful, and curious, allowing your feelings and imagination to guide you. The card also suggests that you may receive a message or unexpected news that sparks emotional growth or creative endeavors.

reversed.keywords: Emotional immaturity, insecurity, lack of creativity, blocked feelings.
reversed.advice: Take time to address any emotional insecurities or creative blockages. It may be necessary to grow emotionally or explore new ways to express yourself.
reversed.description: The Page of Cups reversed suggests emotional immaturity, insecurity, or difficulty expressing feelings. You may be struggling with emotional growth or feeling creatively blocked. This card encourages you to look within and work on developing your emotional intelligence, addressing insecurities that may be holding you back. It can also indicate that you are ignoring your intuition or suppressing creative impulses. The reversal is a reminder to reconnect with your emotional and imaginative side and allow yourself to grow in these areas.

uprigth.keywords: New love, emotional beginnings, romantic offers, sensitivity.
uprigth.advice: Be open to new romantic possibilities. Approach relationships with curiosity and emotional vulnerability.
uprigth.description: The Page of Cups represents a new emotional or romantic beginning, often symbolizing a message of love or an offer. It can indicate the start of a new relationship or a renewal of emotional connection in an existing one. The Page encourages you to approach love with a sense of wonder and openness. This is a time for exploring your feelings and letting your emotions guide you in relationships.

reversed.keywords: Emotional immaturity, insecurity, avoidance of feelings.
reversed.advice: Work on emotional growth before entering into relationships. Avoid letting insecurity cloud your judgment.
reversed.description: In the reversed position, the Page of Cups suggests emotional immaturity or an unwillingness to confront feelings. It can indicate that you or your partner may not be ready for a deep emotional commitment. This card encourages reflection on emotional patterns and growth before moving forward in love.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is creative and open-hearted, often bringing a sense of playfulness and curiosity to the relationship. They may be in touch with their emotions and intuition.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with emotional immaturity or be overly idealistic about love, potentially leading to disappointment.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of emotional exploration or artistic expression, possibly at a creative workshop or event.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when feeling emotionally vulnerable or while navigating through unrealistic expectations in love.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is innocent, tender, and filled with curiosity. Both partners may feel emotionally open and ready to explore their feelings, fostering a relationship based on emotional discovery.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional immaturity or unrealistic emotional expectations. One or both partners could be emotionally unprepared for the depth of the connection.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may stem from emotional naivety or a tendency to avoid serious discussions about feelings and commitments.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could arise from misunderstandings or an inability to express feelings openly, leading to confusion in the relationship.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Embrace your own creativity and emotional depth, as this will attract your soulmate. Stay open to love and be willing to express your feelings.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on grounding your emotions and developing clearer communication about your needs and desires.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the value of emotional expression and the joy of exploring love with curiosity and wonder.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to balance your emotions and avoid falling into unrealistic romantic ideals.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship holds the potential for a playful and emotionally fulfilling partnership, encouraging both partners to explore their feelings together.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if emotional communication is lacking, but it can thrive with openness and vulnerability.

name: Knight of Cups (Card 12 in the Cups)

uprigth.keywords: Romance, idealism, charm, pursuit of dreams, emotional action.
uprigth.advice: Follow your heart’s desires and pursue your dreams with passion. Let your emotions guide you in matters of love and creativity.
uprigth.description: The Knight of Cups represents romantic pursuit, idealism, and taking action based on emotions. This card often symbolizes someone who is following their heart, seeking love, or pursuing their creative dreams. The Knight of Cups encourages you to embrace your romantic or artistic side, allowing your emotions and ideals to lead the way. It’s a card of charm, inspiration, and passion, suggesting that you may be involved in a romantic relationship or creative project that requires emotional investment. The card also highlights the importance of staying true to your ideals, even in the face of challenges.

reversed.keywords: Unrealistic expectations, emotional impulsiveness, disappointment, moodiness.
reversed.advice: Be mindful of chasing unrealistic fantasies or acting impulsively based on fleeting emotions. Ground your dreams in reality.
reversed.description: The Knight of Cups reversed suggests emotional impulsiveness, disappointment, or mood swings. You may be chasing after unrealistic ideals or engaging in romantic or creative endeavors that lack a grounded approach. The reversal warns against acting too quickly based on emotions alone, as this could lead to disappointment or frustration. It’s important to find balance between your dreams and reality, and to avoid letting fleeting emotions dictate your actions. The reversed Knight of Cups encourages you to reassess your goals and ensure that they are attainable.

uprigth.keywords: Romance, charm, emotional expression, pursuit of love.
uprigth.advice: Allow your romantic side to lead the way, but stay grounded in reality. Pursue love with sincerity.
uprigth.description: The Knight of Cups represents someone who is deeply in touch with their emotions and is eager to express love and affection. This card can indicate the arrival of a romantic partner who is charming and idealistic, or it may represent a phase in your own life where you are driven by emotional fulfillment and romantic aspirations. The Knight of Cups advises you to embrace love with an open heart but also to ensure your expectations are realistic.

reversed.keywords: Emotional manipulation, unrealistic expectations, moodiness.
reversed.advice: Be mindful of emotional games or manipulation in your relationships. Avoid putting partners on a pedestal.
reversed.description: The reversed Knight of Cups warns of emotional instability or manipulation within relationships. It suggests that someone may be leading with their emotions in a way that is unhealthy, creating unrealistic expectations or becoming overly moody and unpredictable. It’s important to stay balanced and avoid romanticizing relationships to an unhealthy degree.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is romantic and idealistic, often driven by their emotions and creativity. They may be passionate and nurturing in their approach to love.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with emotional turbulence or be overly focused on their fantasies, which can create challenges in the relationship.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of emotional exploration or while pursuing creative passions, perhaps at an artistic or cultural event.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when dealing with emotional challenges or during a period of seeking clarity in your own desires.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is romantic, passionate, and idealistic. Both partners are deeply in tune with their emotions, often expressing love and affection freely.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may be emotionally inconsistent or overly idealized. One or both partners may struggle with emotional volatility or unrealistic romantic expectations.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from emotional idealism or unrealistic expectations about love that can lead to disappointment.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from emotional instability or difficulty in expressing feelings, creating misunderstandings between you.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Stay true to your romantic ideals, but be mindful of grounding your expectations in reality. Embrace your emotions fully.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on stabilizing your emotions and communicate openly to avoid misunderstandings and foster deeper connections.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the beauty of romantic connections and the importance of emotional honesty.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to balance your romantic ideals with the realities of love, understanding the need for clear communication.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential for deep emotional and romantic fulfillment, fostering creativity and passion between partners.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face challenges if emotional volatility is not addressed, but it can deepen through mutual understanding and trust.

name: Queen of Cups (Card 13 in the Cups)

uprigth.keywords: Compassion, emotional intelligence, nurturing, empathy, intuition.
uprigth.advice: Trust your intuition and lead with compassion in your relationships. Offer emotional support and understanding to those around you.
uprigth.description: The Queen of Cups represents emotional intelligence, compassion, and nurturing energy. She is deeply empathetic and intuitive, often serving as a source of emotional support for others. The Queen of Cups encourages you to connect with your emotions and use them to guide your relationships and decisions. She embodies kindness, understanding, and unconditional love, reminding you to be compassionate toward yourself and others. This card suggests that you are in a position to offer emotional guidance or healing, and that your intuitive abilities are strong. It’s a time to lead with your heart and embrace emotional wisdom.

reversed.keywords: Emotional overwhelm, codependency, over-sensitivity, neglecting self-care.
reversed.advice: Take time for self-care and establish emotional boundaries. Avoid becoming too involved in others' emotional issues at the expense of your own well-being.
reversed.description: The Queen of Cups reversed indicates emotional overwhelm, neglect of self-care, or difficulty establishing boundaries. You may be overly focused on others' emotional needs, to the point where you are neglecting your own well-being. The reversal encourages you to create healthy emotional boundaries and prioritize your self-care. It’s important to avoid becoming too involved in others' problems or taking on their emotional burdens. The reversed Queen of Cups is a reminder to balance empathy with self-care and to protect your emotional energy.

uprigth.keywords: Emotional nurturing, compassion, intuitive understanding, emotional security
uprigth.advice: Trust your emotional intuition and nurture those you love. Create a safe emotional space in your relationship.
uprigth.description: The Queen of Cups embodies emotional security, compassion, and deep intuitive understanding. She encourages you to be empathetic and nurturing in your relationships. This card often suggests that you or your partner may need extra emotional support and care. It’s a reminder to create a safe, loving space where both you and your partner can be vulnerable and open. The Queen of Cups is a sign of emotional fulfillment and stability in love.

reversed.keywords: Emotional overwhelm, co-dependency, suppressed feelings.
reversed.advice: Set healthy emotional boundaries and avoid overextending yourself in relationships.
reversed.description: When reversed, the Queen of Cups indicates emotional overwhelm or unhealthy emotional boundaries. It may suggest that you are giving too much of yourself in a relationship or neglecting your own emotional needs. There could be a tendency toward co-dependency or difficulty expressing feelings. This card advises you to focus on emotional balance and ensure that your needs are met, as well as those of your partner.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is nurturing, empathetic, and deeply intuitive. They are likely to be in tune with their emotions and the emotions of those around them, offering support and understanding.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with emotional boundaries or be overly sensitive, potentially leading to emotional drain in relationships.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of emotional openness, perhaps while engaging in community support or healing activities.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when navigating through emotional turbulence or while dealing with personal insecurities.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is nurturing, empathetic, and deeply intuitive. Both partners are in tune with each other’s emotional needs, creating a relationship based on compassion and emotional understanding.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional codependency or emotional manipulation. One or both partners could be overly sensitive or emotionally overwhelmed, leading to emotional instability.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from emotional dependence or a tendency to prioritize others’ needs over your own, which can lead to imbalance.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from unresolved emotional issues or difficulty in expressing feelings openly, creating barriers to intimacy.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Embrace your emotional depth and intuition. Be open to nurturing connections and focus on creating a supportive environment for love to flourish.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on establishing healthy emotional boundaries and ensure that your needs are also met in relationships.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the importance of emotional support and the power of empathy in nurturing love.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to navigate emotional complexities and establish healthy boundaries to foster a more balanced connection.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship holds the potential to be emotionally fulfilling and deeply nurturing, allowing both partners to grow in love and support each other’s dreams.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face challenges if emotional boundaries are not respected, but it can lead to healing and growth through mutual understanding and care.

name: King of Cups (Card 14 in the Cups)

uprigth.keywords: Emotional balance, leadership, compassion, wisdom, emotional control.
uprigth.advice: Lead with emotional wisdom and balance. Use your experience to guide others, and remain calm in emotionally charged situations.
uprigth.description: The King of Cups represents emotional balance, wisdom, and compassionate leadership. He is someone who has mastered his emotions and uses them to guide his actions with kindness and integrity. This card suggests that you have achieved emotional maturity and are in a position to offer guidance and support to others. The King of Cups encourages you to remain calm and compassionate in emotionally charged situations, using your wisdom and empathy to navigate challenges. It’s a card of emotional control, suggesting that you can handle complex emotional issues with grace and understanding.

reversed.keywords: Emotional manipulation, moodiness, volatility, suppressed emotions.
reversed.advice: Be cautious of emotional manipulation or suppressing your feelings. Seek healthy ways to express your emotions and regain balance.
reversed.description: The King of Cups reversed suggests emotional volatility, manipulation, or difficulty expressing emotions in a healthy way. You may be struggling to maintain emotional control, or you could be suppressing feelings that need to be addressed. The reversal warns against using emotions to manipulate others or acting out in a moody or unpredictable manner. It’s important to find balance and seek healthy outlets for emotional expression. The reversed King of Cups encourages you to reconnect with your emotional wisdom and avoid allowing negative emotions to dominate your actions.

uprigth.keywords: Emotional maturity, calmness, compassion, balanced emotions.
uprigth.advice: Maintain emotional balance in relationships. Lead with compassion and understanding.
uprigth.description: The King of Cups represents emotional maturity and the ability to stay calm and compassionate in any situation. In love, he symbolizes a partner who is emotionally balanced and capable of providing deep, stable love. This card advises you to approach relationships with maturity, kindness, and empathy. It encourages you to be in control of your emotions while offering support and understanding to your partner.

reversed.keywords: Emotional detachment, manipulation, repression of feelings.
reversed.advice: Avoid emotional detachment or manipulation in your relationships. Express your feelings openly.
reversed.description: In the reversed position, the King of Cups warns of emotional detachment or manipulation. You or your partner may be withholding emotions, creating distance or an imbalance in the relationship. It can also indicate emotional control being used in an unhealthy way. The card encourages you to be honest about your feelings and work toward emotional openness.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is compassionate and emotionally wise, capable of balancing their feelings with rationality. They likely approach relationships with care and understanding.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with emotional expression or may be overly controlling, leading to emotional conflicts in the relationship.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of emotional stability, perhaps while engaging in community service or during events focused on emotional well-being.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them during times of emotional upheaval or when you are grappling with issues of control and vulnerability.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is stable, compassionate, and emotionally mature. Both partners feel emotionally secure in the relationship, creating a deep and balanced emotional bond.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional repression or emotional detachment. One or both partners could be emotionally unavailable or unwilling to express their true feelings.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from emotional avoidance or a tendency to keep feelings hidden, preventing deeper connections.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from emotional manipulation or difficulties in communication, leading to misunderstandings between you.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Cultivate emotional intelligence and openness in your relationships. Being honest about your feelings will attract your soulmate.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Focus on improving emotional communication and being vulnerable, which will help in building a deeper connection.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the importance of emotional maturity and understanding in fostering a healthy bond.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to confront emotional challenges and develop better ways to express your feelings and needs.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be emotionally rich and supportive, allowing both partners to explore their feelings and grow together through shared understanding.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face difficulties if emotional expression is stifled, but it can deepen with commitment to open communication and emotional balance.

name: Ace of Wands (Card 1 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Inspiration, new beginnings, potential, growth, creative spark.
uprigth.advice: Take advantage of the fresh energy and inspiration around you. Pursue your passions and allow your creativity to flourish.
uprigth.description: The Ace of Wands represents the spark of inspiration and the start of new ventures. It signals a surge of creative energy, enthusiasm, and the potential for personal growth. This card often appears when you are on the verge of a breakthrough in creativity or passion, whether it's a new project, idea, or opportunity. The Ace of Wands encourages you to take bold steps and trust in your instincts to move forward. It’s a time of high energy and optimism, where anything feels possible if you take action.

reversed.keywords: Lack of direction, delays, missed opportunities, creative block.
reversed.advice: Reassess your goals and consider whether you need more clarity before taking action. Address any creative blocks holding you back.
reversed.description: The Ace of Wands reversed suggests a lack of direction or creative blocks. You may feel stuck, uninspired, or unsure of your next steps. This card indicates missed opportunities or delays in progress, often because of hesitation or uncertainty. It’s important to reconnect with your passions and find clarity in your goals. The reversal also warns against impulsiveness; take the time to plan and prepare before jumping into new ventures.

uprigth.keywords: Passion, new beginnings, excitement, inspiration, sexual energy.
uprigth.advice: Take action and embrace the excitement of a new romantic chapter. Let your passion guide you.
uprigth.description: The Ace of Wands symbolizes a passionate and exciting new beginning in love. This card suggests that you may be entering a relationship filled with enthusiasm, energy, and desire. It also indicates the potential for sexual attraction and chemistry. If you’re in an existing relationship, the Ace of Wands can indicate a rekindling of passion and excitement. Embrace this surge of energy and be open to new possibilities in love.

reversed.keywords: Lack of passion, hesitation, missed opportunities, emotional blockages.
reversed.advice: Reignite the spark in your love life or take time to address emotional blockages. Avoid letting hesitation hold you back.
reversed.description: In the reversed position, the Ace of Wands suggests a lack of passion or missed opportunities in love. You may feel hesitant to take a step forward, or the excitement in your relationship could be fading. This card encourages you to explore ways to reignite the spark or consider whether emotional blockages are preventing you from embracing love fully.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is passionate, energetic, and full of creative potential. They are likely to be inspiring and driven, always ready to take action and follow their ambitions.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with scattered energy or a lack of direction, leading to impulsive decisions or an inability to commit fully.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of new beginnings or creative ventures, perhaps when you’re starting a new project or following your passions.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when you’re feeling stuck or uninspired, and their energy will help reignite your passions.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is filled with passion, enthusiasm, and excitement. Both partners feel a surge of emotional energy, fueling creativity and a sense of adventure in the relationship.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with a lack of emotional drive or inspiration. One or both partners may feel emotionally unmotivated or disconnected, leading to a sense of stagnation.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from impatience or a rush to action without proper planning, leading to instability in the relationship.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from burnout or a lack of follow-through, preventing the relationship from progressing.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Follow your passions and pursue new experiences. Your soulmate is likely to appear when you are fully engaged in something that excites you.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Focus on regaining your motivation and direction in life. Clarity of purpose will help attract your soulmate.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the power of inspiration and the importance of taking action in pursuing your desires.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to balance impulsiveness with thoughtful planning, ensuring that both passion and stability coexist in the relationship.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be vibrant and exciting, filled with creative energy and shared enthusiasm for life’s adventures.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle with inconsistency if energy isn’t channeled constructively, but with effort, it can become a source of mutual inspiration and growth.

name: Two of Wands (Card 2 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Planning, progress, decisions, expansion, future vision.
uprigth.advice: Focus on long-term planning and make decisions that align with your vision for the future. Take calculated steps toward expansion and growth.
uprigth.description: The Two of Wands represents planning and decision-making for the future. It signifies a period of contemplation, where you are considering your next steps and exploring new opportunities. This card suggests that you have a clear vision of your goals and are ready to expand your horizons. It encourages you to step out of your comfort zone and take action toward your ambitions. The Two of Wands is a card of progress, asking you to be bold in making decisions that will lead to future growth and success.

reversed.keywords: Indecision, fear of the unknown, restricted options, playing it safe.
reversed.advice: Overcome your fear of uncertainty and take decisive action. Avoid letting indecision hold you back from expanding your horizons.
reversed.description: The Two of Wands reversed suggests indecision, hesitation, or fear of the unknown. You may be avoiding making important decisions or taking action due to fear of the risks involved. This card warns against staying in your comfort zone for too long, as it can lead to stagnation. The reversal encourages you to confront your fears, take calculated risks, and trust that expanding your vision will lead to growth and opportunity.

uprigth.keywords: Planning, partnership, future vision, decisions.
uprigth.advice: Look ahead and plan for the future of your relationship. Make decisions that align with your long-term goals.
uprigth.description: The Two of Wands indicates that you are at a crossroads in your romantic life. You may be making decisions about the future of your relationship or considering whether to move forward with a potential partner. This card suggests that now is a time for planning and setting long-term goals in love. It’s also a sign of evaluating the potential of a partnership and deciding whether it aligns with your vision of the future.

reversed.keywords: Indecision, hesitation, fear of the future, lack of direction.
reversed.advice: Make a decision and move forward confidently. Avoid letting fear of the unknown hold you back.
reversed.description: The reversed Two of Wands suggests indecision or fear of moving forward in a relationship. You may feel uncertain about the future or hesitant to commit to a romantic partnership. This card encourages you to confront these fears and make a choice about what direction you want your love life to take. A lack of action could lead to stagnation.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is a visionary, someone who plans ahead and carefully considers their options. They are likely to be ambitious and focused on long-term goals.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with indecision or fear of the unknown, which could hinder their ability to move forward in relationships.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate when you are at a crossroads, facing important decisions about your future and planning for what comes next.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them during a time of indecision or when you are feeling unsure about your direction in life.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is forward-thinking and filled with potential. Both partners are planning their future together, driven by a shared sense of purpose and ambition.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional uncertainty or indecision. One or both partners could feel emotionally conflicted about the direction of the relationship, causing tension.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from hesitation or over-planning, which could delay the development of the relationship.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from fear of commitment or an unwillingness to take risks, preventing the relationship from moving forward.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Be open to new possibilities and take calculated risks in love. Your soulmate may appear when you are ready to step outside your comfort zone.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on overcoming fears of change or failure. Embracing uncertainty will help you find your soulmate.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the importance of planning for the future together and making decisions as a team.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to navigate uncertainty and build trust in each other’s ability to take risks for the sake of the relationship.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to grow steadily as you both work toward shared goals, creating a partnership built on mutual respect and vision.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face delays or setbacks due to indecision, but with patience and courage, it can move forward and develop into something lasting.

name: Three of Wands (Card 3 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Expansion, foresight, long-term planning, success, adventure.
uprigth.advice: Broaden your horizons and look toward future possibilities. Take proactive steps toward your goals and embrace new opportunities.
uprigth.description: The Three of Wands signifies expansion, progress, and long-term planning. This card represents looking beyond your immediate surroundings and considering broader possibilities for growth and success. You are likely experiencing the results of previous efforts, and this card encourages you to keep moving forward with confidence. The Three of Wands is about exploration, adventure, and taking calculated risks to achieve long-term success. It’s a time to set your sights on the future and embrace the opportunities that are coming your way.

reversed.keywords: Delays, lack of foresight, setbacks, frustration, limited progress.
reversed.advice: Address any delays or obstacles that are hindering your progress. Be open to re-evaluating your plans if necessary to ensure future success.
reversed.description: The Three of Wands reversed suggests delays, setbacks, or a lack of foresight in your plans. You may feel frustrated by a lack of progress or be facing obstacles that prevent you from moving forward. This card encourages you to re-evaluate your goals and consider whether you need to adjust your approach. The reversal also warns against tunnel vision—make sure you are considering all possibilities and not limiting your opportunities for success.

uprigth.keywords: Expansion, growth, long-term planning, exploring new possibilities.
uprigth.advice: Be open to expanding your horizons in love. Long-term growth is on the horizon, so plan ahead.
uprigth.description: The Three of Wands represents expansion and growth in relationships. It suggests that you are looking beyond the immediate future and considering long-term possibilities with your partner. This card indicates that your relationship has the potential for lasting growth and fulfillment, but it may also require patience and planning. If you’re single, the Three of Wands suggests that love may come from unexpected places, and you should be open to new opportunities.

reversed.keywords: Delays, frustration, lack of progress, missed opportunities.
reversed.advice: Be patient and allow time for growth. Address any obstacles that are slowing down your romantic progress.
reversed.description: The reversed Three of Wands indicates delays or frustration in your romantic life. You may feel that your relationship is not progressing as quickly as you’d like or that there are obstacles preventing growth. This card encourages patience and reminds you to stay focused on the bigger picture. Missed opportunities in love could also be a factor, so be aware of any chances you may have overlooked.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is adventurous and forward-thinking, always looking to expand their horizons. They are likely to be optimistic and eager to explore new opportunities.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with impatience or have difficulty following through on long-term plans, leading to frustration or stagnation.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a period of expansion, such as when you’re exploring new opportunities or embarking on a journey.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when you are feeling stuck or frustrated with your current progress, and they will encourage you to keep moving forward.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is expansive and optimistic. Both partners are looking ahead with confidence, feeling emotionally ready to explore new experiences together.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional delays or setbacks. One or both partners could feel emotionally stuck, unable to move forward in the relationship as planned.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from impatience or a tendency to overlook the present in pursuit of future goals.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from frustration with delays or a lack of clear direction, causing tension in the relationship.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Embrace your adventurous side and be open to exploring new possibilities. Your soulmate is likely to appear when you are ready to take bold steps forward.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on managing your impatience and focus on long-term planning. Trust that your soulmate will come into your life when the time is right.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the importance of patience and perseverance in working toward a shared vision for the future.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to deal with frustration and develop the resilience needed to keep moving forward despite setbacks.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be expansive and growth-oriented, with both partners working together toward future success and fulfillment.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face difficulties if impatience or frustration is not managed, but with perseverance, it can lead to a rewarding and fulfilling partnership.

name: Four of Wands (Card 4 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Celebration, harmony, homecoming, stability, community.
uprigth.advice: Enjoy the moment of stability and harmony in your life. Celebrate your achievements and nurture your connections with loved ones.
uprigth.description: The Four of Wands represents celebration, stability, and harmony within your personal or community life. It is a card of joyous occasions, such as weddings, reunions, or homecomings, where you are surrounded by supportive people. The Four of Wands also symbolizes the completion of a goal or milestone and the satisfaction that comes from building a strong foundation. It encourages you to take time to celebrate your successes and to appreciate the sense of stability and happiness you’ve created in your life.

reversed.keywords: Disruption, instability, lack of support, conflict, delays.
reversed.advice: Address any disruptions or instability in your environment. Work to restore harmony and support within your relationships or community.
reversed.description: The Four of Wands reversed suggests disruption, instability, or conflict within your home or community. There may be issues that are preventing you from feeling secure or supported, and this card encourages you to address them. The reversal also indicates delays in celebrations or the completion of important milestones, leading to frustration or disappointment. It’s important to work through these challenges and focus on restoring balance and harmony in your life.

uprigth.keywords: Celebration, harmony, stability, commitment, home.
uprigth.advice: Embrace harmony and stability in your relationship. Celebrate your achievements together and strengthen your bond.
uprigth.description: The Four of Wands is a card of celebration and harmony, often representing a strong and stable relationship. It can signify a time of commitment, such as engagement, marriage, or moving in together. This card encourages you to celebrate the love and joy you’ve created with your partner and to recognize the stability and security you’ve built together. It’s a card of happiness, suggesting that you are on solid ground in your romantic life.

reversed.keywords: Instability, tension, lack of commitment, unresolved conflict.
reversed.advice: Address any underlying issues in your relationship to restore harmony. Avoid ignoring tension or instability.
reversed.description: When reversed, the Four of Wands indicates instability or unresolved conflict in a relationship. There may be tension beneath the surface that needs to be addressed in order to restore harmony. This card suggests that you or your partner may be avoiding commitment or facing challenges that are disrupting the stability of your connection. It’s important to confront these issues and work toward rebuilding security.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is someone who values stability, celebration, and harmony. They are likely to be supportive and eager to build a strong foundation for a long-term relationship.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with commitment or have difficulty finding a sense of stability, which could create challenges in forming a solid relationship.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of celebration, such as at a wedding, party, or other significant life events.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when you are seeking stability or dealing with disruptions in your personal life.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is celebratory and stable. Both partners feel secure and happy in the relationship, often celebrating emotional milestones and achievements together.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may be experiencing emotional instability or a lack of commitment. There could be disruptions in the emotional foundation, causing unease or doubt.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from a lack of shared goals or difficulty establishing long-term stability in the relationship.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from disruptions in your personal lives or a reluctance to fully commit to the relationship.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Focus on building a stable and harmonious life. Your soulmate will likely enter your life when you are in a place of personal stability and joy.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on finding your own sense of stability before seeking a relationship. Your soulmate will appear when you are ready for a long-term commitment.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the importance of building a strong foundation for love and celebrating the milestones you achieve together.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to navigate disruptions and work toward creating stability and harmony in your relationship.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be joyful and harmonious, leading to long-term stability and shared celebrations of life’s milestones.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face challenges if stability is not prioritized, but with effort, it can become a strong and enduring union.

name: Five of Wands (Card 5 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Conflict, competition, tension, disagreement, struggle.
uprigth.advice: Be mindful of how you handle conflict or competition. Focus on finding common ground and resolving disagreements in a constructive manner.
uprigth.description: The Five of Wands represents conflict, tension, and competition. This card suggests that you may be involved in a struggle or disagreement, whether in a personal, professional, or social context. The conflict may arise from competing goals, egos, or differing opinions, and it can create stress and tension. The Five of Wands encourages you to handle conflict with care, seeking compromise and resolution where possible. It’s a time to be aware of the impact of competition on your relationships and to find ways to work together rather than against each other.

reversed.keywords: Avoidance of conflict, inner struggle, suppressed tension, passive resistance.
reversed.advice: Address underlying tensions instead of avoiding conflict. Open communication can help resolve issues before they escalate.
reversed.description: The Five of Wands reversed suggests avoidance of conflict or tension that is simmering beneath the surface. You may be trying to avoid confrontation or suppress your feelings, but this can lead to unresolved issues festering over time. The reversal encourages you to face conflicts directly, using open communication to resolve disagreements before they escalate. It’s important to address inner struggles or external tensions in a constructive way, rather than avoiding them altogether.

uprigth.keywords: Conflict, competition, tension, disagreements.
uprigth.advice: Navigate conflicts with patience and understanding. Avoid unnecessary arguments and focus on resolution.
uprigth.description: The Five of Wands represents conflict and tension in relationships. This card suggests that you and your partner may be experiencing disagreements, competition, or external pressures that are causing friction. It’s important to approach these challenges with patience and a willingness to resolve issues rather than escalate them. If you’re single, this card can indicate competition for a romantic interest or internal conflict about pursuing a relationship.

reversed.keywords: Resolution, compromise, avoiding conflict, harmony.
reversed.advice: Seek resolution to ongoing conflicts and strive for compromise. Let go of unnecessary tension.
reversed.description: In the reversed position, the Five of Wands suggests a desire to resolve conflicts and restore harmony in your relationship. You may be moving away from tension and working toward compromise. This card encourages you to focus on finding solutions rather than dwelling on disagreements. If conflict has been holding you back in love, now is the time to let go of it and move toward a more peaceful and understanding dynamic.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is someone who is competitive and energetic, often engaging in healthy debates and challenges. They enjoy lively interactions and pushing boundaries.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with conflict resolution or be prone to avoiding confrontations, which can lead to tension in the relationship.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of competition or challenge, perhaps in a social or professional setting where multiple people are vying for attention or success.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them during moments of internal or external conflict, when tensions are high, or when you are navigating challenging situations.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection may be challenged by conflict or competition. Both partners could be emotionally struggling to find common ground, leading to arguments or misunderstandings.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship has the potential to overcome emotional conflicts. Both partners may find ways to resolve their differences and work together towards emotional harmony.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from differing opinions or competition, leading to misunderstandings or clashes of egos within the relationship.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from avoiding conflicts altogether, leading to unresolved issues that create distance between you.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Be open to spirited debates and healthy competition. Your soulmate will be drawn to your passion and willingness to stand your ground.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Learn to address conflict directly and constructively. Avoiding difficult conversations could prevent deeper emotional connections.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the importance of communication and cooperation in the face of challenges, helping you grow stronger together.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to navigate conflict in a healthy way and develop patience when dealing with differences of opinion.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be dynamic and passionate, where both partners learn to balance their competitive natures with cooperation.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face difficulties if conflicts are avoided or not resolved, but it can evolve positively with open communication and compromise.

name: Six of Wands (Card 6 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Victory, recognition, success, achievement, confidence.
uprigth.advice: Celebrate your victories and achievements, and take pride in the recognition you’ve earned. Use your success to inspire others.
uprigth.description: The Six of Wands represents victory, success, and public recognition. This card indicates that you have achieved a significant goal or milestone and are being acknowledged for your efforts. Whether through personal achievement or professional success, the Six of Wands encourages you to take pride in your accomplishments and enjoy the recognition that comes with them. This card also suggests that your confidence is high, and you are in a position to inspire and lead others. It’s a time to celebrate your hard-earned success and use your achievements to motivate further progress.

reversed.keywords: Lack of recognition, self-doubt, failure, setback, disappointment.
reversed.advice: Address any feelings of self-doubt or lack of recognition. Reflect on your efforts and seek ways to overcome setbacks and rebuild confidence.
reversed.description: The Six of Wands reversed suggests that you may be experiencing a lack of recognition or feeling overlooked despite your efforts. This card indicates disappointment, setbacks, or self-doubt that are preventing you from celebrating your successes. The reversal encourages you to reflect on your progress and consider whether external validation is influencing your self-worth. It’s important to rebuild your confidence and focus on your achievements, even if they are not yet being acknowledged by others.

uprigth.keywords: Victory, success, recognition, achievement, confidence.
uprigth.advice: Enjoy the success in your relationship or personal growth. Celebrate victories and acknowledge the effort put in.
uprigth.description: The Six of Wands is a card of victory and recognition, symbolizing success in your romantic endeavors. Whether you're in a relationship or single, this card suggests that you are entering a period of confidence and achievement in love. If you’re in a relationship, you may feel appreciated, valued, and recognized for your efforts. If you’re single, this card can indicate that your confidence is attracting positive attention, and you may soon experience a romantic victory.

reversed.keywords: Ego, lack of recognition, setbacks, pride, failure.
reversed.advice: Avoid letting pride or ego interfere with your relationship. Focus on genuine connection rather than external validation.
reversed.description: The reversed Six of Wands suggests a lack of recognition or a feeling that your efforts in love have gone unnoticed. You may be experiencing setbacks or disappointments in your romantic life. This card urges you to reflect on whether pride or ego is getting in the way of your relationship. Instead of seeking external validation, focus on the genuine emotional bond you share with your partner.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is confident and successful, likely someone who is recognized for their achievements. They bring a sense of pride and accomplishment to the relationship.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with self-doubt or fear of failure, which could affect their confidence in the relationship.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate when you are experiencing success or public recognition, perhaps at a time when you are feeling accomplished or confident.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them during moments of self-doubt or when you are seeking validation and support.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is victorious and uplifting. Both partners feel proud of their emotional achievements, often celebrating the success of their relationship together.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional pride or arrogance. One or both partners could feel emotionally neglected or unappreciated, leading to tension or resentment.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from pride or the need for constant validation, which can lead to misunderstandings or distance within the relationship.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from insecurity or a lack of self-confidence, making it difficult to fully trust in the connection.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Embrace your accomplishments and be proud of your journey. Your soulmate will be drawn to your self-assurance and confidence.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on building your self-esteem and avoid seeking validation solely from others. Confidence will attract a more balanced relationship.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the value of celebrating each other’s successes and providing mutual support and recognition.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to overcome insecurities and develop a deeper sense of self-worth, both within yourself and in your partner.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be supportive and empowering, where both partners celebrate each other’s victories and accomplishments.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if one or both partners seek constant validation, but it can grow stronger with open communication and mutual encouragement.

name: Seven of Wands (Card 7 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Perseverance, defense, competition, standing your ground.
