uprigth.advice: Stand firm in your beliefs and defend your position, even when faced with opposition. Trust in your strength and ability to overcome challenges.
uprigth.description: The Seven of Wands represents perseverance in the face of challenges and opposition. It suggests that you are in a position where you must defend your beliefs, ideas, or achievements against others who may challenge you. This card encourages you to stand your ground, maintain your courage, and fight for what you believe in. Although the competition may be tough, the Seven of Wands reminds you that you have the inner strength and determination to overcome obstacles. It’s a time to be assertive and protect what you have worked hard to achieve.

reversed.keywords: Overwhelm, giving up, feeling defeated, lack of defense.
reversed.advice: Reevaluate whether the struggle is worth continuing. Avoid giving up too soon, but also know when it’s time to walk away from a fight that no longer serves you.
reversed.description: The Seven of Wands reversed suggests feelings of overwhelm or defeat in the face of challenges. You may be finding it difficult to defend your position or feel like the odds are stacked against you. This card indicates that you might be tempted to give up or surrender to the opposition. However, it’s essential to assess whether the battle is worth continuing or if you are fighting for something that no longer aligns with your goals. The reversal encourages you to weigh your options carefully and decide whether to persist or let go.

uprigth.keywords: Defense, perseverance, standing your ground, challenge.
uprigth.advice: Stand up for your relationship or beliefs. Overcoming challenges will strengthen your connection.
uprigth.description: The Seven of Wands represents a period of challenge or defense in a relationship. You may feel the need to protect your relationship from external pressures or defend your choices in love. This card encourages you to stand firm and persevere through obstacles, as doing so will strengthen your bond. If you’re single, the Seven of Wands suggests that you may be facing competition or challenges in your romantic life, but you have the strength to overcome them.

reversed.keywords: Weakness, giving up, feeling overwhelmed, lack of confidence.
reversed.advice: Reassess your relationship or current situation. Don’t let fear or doubt cause you to give up prematurely.
reversed.description: In the reversed position, the Seven of Wands suggests feeling overwhelmed or unsure of your ability to defend your relationship. You may be considering giving up due to challenges or pressure. This card encourages you to reflect on whether the struggle is worth continuing or if it’s time to let go. It’s also a reminder to rebuild your confidence and trust in your decisions, rather than being swayed by external influences.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is resilient, determined, and willing to stand up for what they believe in. They are likely to defend their values and protect the relationship fiercely.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with feeling overwhelmed or defensive, possibly leading to unnecessary conflicts or feeling attacked in the relationship.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate when you are in a position of defending your beliefs or standing your ground, possibly in a challenging or competitive situation.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them during times of self-doubt or when you are feeling under pressure, either personally or professionally.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is strong but may require defending. Both partners are determined to protect their emotional bond, even in the face of challenges or opposition.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional defensiveness or insecurity. One or both partners could feel emotionally overwhelmed, unable to maintain the connection under pressure.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from defensiveness or the need to constantly prove oneself, which can create unnecessary tension in the relationship.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from a lack of boundaries or feeling overwhelmed by external pressures, making it hard to focus on the relationship.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Be true to your values and stand your ground in challenging situations. Your soulmate will admire your strength and determination.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on creating healthy boundaries and avoid taking on too much responsibility. Balance is key to finding and maintaining a strong relationship.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about resilience and standing together in the face of adversity, building a strong and enduring bond.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to navigate feelings of overwhelm and develop strategies for protecting your emotional well-being.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be strong and supportive, where both partners defend and protect each other’s values and well-being.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if defensiveness and overwhelm are not addressed, but it can grow stronger with understanding and mutual support.

name: Eight of Wands (Card 8 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Speed, progress, movement, communication, rapid change.
uprigth.advice: Take swift action toward your goals, as things are moving quickly. Stay focused and communicate clearly to ensure smooth progress.
uprigth.description: The Eight of Wands represents speed, rapid progress, and forward momentum. Things are happening quickly, and there is a sense of energy and excitement in the air. This card often indicates that you are moving toward your goals at a fast pace, and it’s essential to stay focused and maintain clear communication. Whether in work, relationships, or personal growth, the Eight of Wands suggests that positive changes are on the horizon, and you should embrace the fast-moving energy around you. It’s a time of progress, and everything is aligning in your favor.

reversed.keywords: Delays, frustration, miscommunication, lack of progress, stagnation.
reversed.advice: Address any obstacles or delays that are hindering your progress. Clear up misunderstandings and be patient while things align at their own pace.
reversed.description: The Eight of Wands reversed suggests delays, frustration, or a lack of forward movement. Despite your efforts, progress may be slower than expected, leading to impatience or miscommunication. This card encourages you to address any obstacles that are holding you back and to practice patience while things unfold. The reversal warns against trying to force progress or rushing through important details—sometimes, delays happen for a reason. Clear communication and a reassessment of your goals may help you overcome the current stagnation.

uprigth.keywords: Fast progress, movement, communication, excitement, momentum.
uprigth.advice: Embrace the fast-paced energy in your relationship. Open lines of communication will lead to quick progress.
uprigth.description: The Eight of Wands indicates rapid progress and movement in your love life. If you’re in a relationship, this card suggests that things are moving quickly, and there is excitement and positive momentum in your connection. Open communication is key to maintaining harmony. If you’re single, the Eight of Wands indicates that new romantic opportunities may come suddenly, and you should be ready to embrace them. The energy of this card is fast and exciting, bringing about swift changes.

reversed.keywords: Delays, miscommunication, stagnation, lack of progress.
reversed.advice: Be patient during delays and avoid rushing decisions. Clarify any miscommunication in your relationship.
reversed.description: In the reversed position, the Eight of Wands suggests delays or frustration in your love life. Progress may be slower than expected, or miscommunication may be creating tension in your relationship. This card advises patience and urges you to address any misunderstandings to get things back on track. Stagnation is temporary, so be mindful not to let it disrupt your connection.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is fast-paced, energetic, and always on the move. They are likely to bring excitement and rapid change into your life.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with impulsiveness or lack of focus, leading to sudden shifts or instability in the relationship.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of rapid progress or travel, possibly when things in your life are moving quickly or when you are pursuing new opportunities.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them during times of confusion or when things feel chaotic, leading to unexpected connections.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is swift and dynamic. Both partners feel a rush of emotional momentum, propelling the relationship forward with excitement and energy.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional delays or miscommunication. One or both partners could feel emotionally disconnected, causing frustration or impatience.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from the fast pace of the relationship, which could lead to burnout or difficulty keeping up with each other’s energy.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from impulsive decisions or miscommunication, leading to misunderstandings or sudden changes in direction.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Embrace the fast-paced energy of life and be open to new experiences. Your soulmate will be attracted to your adventurous spirit and willingness to take risks.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on finding balance and avoid making impulsive decisions. Take time to reflect before jumping into new relationships.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the power of momentum and how to navigate rapid changes together, creating an exciting and dynamic bond.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn to slow down and reflect on your decisions, developing patience and understanding in the process.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be exhilarating and full of adventure, where both partners support each other in navigating life’s rapid changes.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if impulsiveness and lack of communication are not addressed, but it can flourish with patience and understanding.

name: Nine of Wands (Card 9 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Resilience, persistence, endurance, protection, caution.
uprigth.advice: Stay strong and keep pushing forward, even if the road is tough. Protect yourself from further harm and be cautious, but don’t give up.
uprigth.description: The Nine of Wands is a card of resilience and perseverance. It suggests that you have been through a difficult journey, but you are close to achieving your goals. Despite the challenges you’ve faced, you’ve managed to stand your ground and protect what’s important to you. This card encourages you to keep going, even when the odds seem stacked against you. It’s a reminder of your inner strength and ability to overcome adversity. However, the Nine of Wands also warns you to be cautious and protect yourself from further harm, as you may still face obstacles before reaching the finish line.

reversed.keywords: Exhaustion, burnout, defensiveness, giving up, overwhelm.
reversed.advice: Take a step back and assess whether you need to rest before continuing. Avoid burnout by acknowledging your limits and knowing when to seek help.
reversed.description: The Nine of Wands reversed suggests exhaustion, burnout, or feeling overwhelmed by the challenges you’ve faced. You may be on the verge of giving up because of how drained you feel. This card encourages you to take a step back and consider whether you need rest or support before continuing your journey. It’s essential to acknowledge your limits and not push yourself to the point of total exhaustion. The reversal also warns against becoming overly defensive—while it’s important to protect yourself, you should remain open to help and support from others.

uprigth.keywords: Resilience, persistence, caution, boundaries, guarding.
uprigth.advice: Protect your relationship, but don’t let past hurts cause you to be overly defensive. Trust the bond you’ve built.
uprigth.description: The Nine of Wands symbolizes resilience and the need to protect yourself or your relationship after enduring challenges. You may have been through difficult times in love, and this card indicates that you are wary or guarded as a result. It encourages you to be strong and persistent, but also to be mindful not to become overly defensive. If you’re single, the Nine of Wands suggests that past wounds may be influencing your approach to new relationships. Stay resilient, but be open to healing and trust.

reversed.keywords: Paranoia, burnout, exhaustion, giving up, overprotection.
reversed.advice: Let go of excessive defensiveness or fear in your relationship. Don’t allow past pain to block new opportunities for love.
reversed.description: The reversed Nine of Wands suggests burnout or exhaustion in your love life. You may feel like giving up due to past struggles or ongoing challenges. This card urges you to evaluate whether you are being overly defensive or guarded, and whether your fears are preventing you from moving forward. It's important to find a balance between protecting yourself and allowing yourself to be vulnerable.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is resilient, determined, and protective. They have a strong sense of perseverance and do not give up easily, especially when it comes to relationships.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with trust or feel emotionally drained. They might be hesitant to open up due to past hurts, leading to a sense of defensiveness.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet your soulmate when you or they are in a phase of recovery, having just overcome personal or professional challenges.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when either of you is feeling particularly vulnerable or emotionally guarded due to previous setbacks.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is resilient and determined. Both partners may have faced emotional challenges but remain committed to protecting their bond and moving forward together.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional exhaustion or defensiveness. One or both partners could feel emotionally drained, making it difficult to maintain the connection.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: The main obstacle might be emotional or physical exhaustion. Both partners may be too focused on past battles to fully embrace the present relationship.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could arise from distrust or the inability to move on from past pains, which could hinder emotional openness.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Be patient and open, and demonstrate resilience in your pursuit of love. Your soulmate will admire your determination and strength.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Focus on healing past wounds and opening yourself to trust again. It is crucial to approach new relationships without carrying old baggage.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the power of endurance and the importance of standing by each other through difficult times.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn how to heal emotional scars and build trust slowly, overcoming the walls you’ve both built.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be enduring and resilient, where both partners support each other through challenges and setbacks.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face difficulties if past pains are not resolved, but it can heal and grow stronger with time and effort.

name: Ten of Wands (Card 10 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Burden, responsibility, hard work, stress, overwhelm.
uprigth.advice: Be mindful of taking on too much. Delegate tasks where possible, and prioritize your well-being as you work toward your goals.
uprigth.description: The Ten of Wands represents carrying heavy burdens or responsibilities. You may be feeling the weight of numerous obligations, whether personal, professional, or emotional. This card suggests that while you are working hard to achieve your goals, you may be taking on more than you can handle. It’s a reminder to prioritize your tasks, delegate where possible, and take care of your physical and mental well-being. Although the Ten of Wands indicates that you are near the end of a challenging journey, it’s important to avoid burnout by managing your responsibilities wisely.

reversed.keywords: Release of burdens, delegation, overcommitment, stress relief.
reversed.advice: Let go of unnecessary burdens and allow others to share in your responsibilities. Prioritize your well-being and make space for self-care.
reversed.description: The Ten of Wands reversed suggests the need to release some of the burdens or responsibilities that have been weighing you down. You may have been overcommitting yourself, leading to stress and exhaustion. This card encourages you to let go of unnecessary tasks, delegate to others, and focus on relieving the pressure you’ve been feeling. The reversal is a call to prioritize your well-being and make room for self-care. It’s important to recognize that you don’t have to do everything on your own—asking for help can lighten the load and bring relief.

uprigth.keywords: Burden, responsibility, stress, carrying the load, hard work.
uprigth.advice: Share the burdens of your relationship with your partner. Avoid taking on all the responsibilities alone.
uprigth.description: The Ten of Wands represents a heavy burden or feeling overwhelmed by responsibilities in a relationship. You or your partner may be shouldering too much weight, leading to stress or exhaustion. This card encourages you to share the load and communicate openly with your partner about the pressures you’re feeling. If you’re single, the Ten of Wands suggests that you may be weighed down by personal responsibilities or past emotional baggage, which is making it difficult to embrace love.

reversed.keywords: Release, letting go, relief, delegating, reducing stress.
reversed.advice: Let go of unnecessary burdens in your love life. Allow yourself to release past issues or responsibilities that aren’t yours to carry.
reversed.description: The reversed Ten of Wands indicates a release of burdens or stress in your love life. You may be letting go of past responsibilities or emotional baggage that has been weighing you down. This card suggests that you are ready to reduce the pressure and find relief, either by delegating responsibilities or by walking away from a situation that is no longer serving you.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is hardworking and responsible, often shouldering burdens to ensure the well-being of others. They are deeply committed but may struggle with work-life balance.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may take on too much, leading to burnout. They could struggle with sharing responsibilities and may feel overwhelmed by their duties.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet your soulmate when both of you are experiencing high levels of responsibility or stress, possibly during a period of hard work or duty.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when either of you is feeling overburdened or when there is a need to release some of the responsibilities being carried.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection may feel burdensome or overwhelming. Both partners could be carrying emotional responsibilities or stress that weigh heavily on the relationship.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship has the potential to release emotional burdens. Both partners may find ways to ease emotional strain and create a lighter, more balanced connection.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from carrying too many burdens, both individually and within the relationship. Overworking or taking on too much could prevent emotional intimacy.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from one or both partners being unable to share their burdens, leading to feelings of overwhelm and emotional distance.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Learn to delegate and release unnecessary burdens. Your soulmate will value balance and the ability to share life’s responsibilities.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Focus on lightening your load and not taking on too much. Enter the relationship with a healthy balance of personal and shared duties.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the importance of shared responsibility and working together to ease the burdens of life.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn the importance of letting go of unnecessary weight, emotionally and physically, for the sake of the relationship.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be one of mutual support, where both partners help each other carry the load of life’s challenges.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if the burdens are too heavy to bear alone, but with mutual support and balance, it can thrive.

name: Page of Wands (Card 11 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Enthusiasm, exploration, discovery, inspiration, curiosity.
uprigth.advice: Embrace new opportunities with a sense of adventure and curiosity. Trust in your creative instincts and allow your enthusiasm to guide you.
uprigth.description: The Page of Wands represents youthful enthusiasm, curiosity, and the desire for exploration. This card suggests that you are ready to embark on a new adventure, whether in the form of a project, creative endeavor, or personal discovery. The Page of Wands encourages you to embrace new opportunities with excitement and an open mind. It’s a time of inspiration and exploration, where you can learn and grow from your experiences. The Page of Wands is a reminder to trust in your creative instincts and follow your passions with courage and confidence.

reversed.keywords: Lack of direction, procrastination, pessimism, inaction, creative block.
reversed.advice: Overcome any creative blocks by reconnecting with your passions. Avoid procrastination and find ways to reignite your enthusiasm for new opportunities.
reversed.description: The Page of Wands reversed suggests a lack of direction or enthusiasm. You may be feeling uninspired, unsure of your next steps, or stuck in procrastination. This card indicates that creative blocks or pessimism may be preventing you from pursuing new opportunities. The reversal encourages you to reconnect with your passions and find ways to reignite your sense of adventure. It’s important to overcome any hesitation or self-doubt and take action toward your goals, even if the path ahead is unclear.

uprigth.keywords: Excitement, enthusiasm, new beginnings, curiosity, adventure.
uprigth.advice: Embrace the passion and excitement in your relationship. Approach love with an open heart and a sense of adventure.
uprigth.description: The Page of Wands brings a burst of enthusiasm and excitement to your love life. If you're in a relationship, this card suggests that a new, exciting phase is emerging, filled with curiosity and passion. The energy is playful and adventurous, encouraging you to explore new aspects of your connection. If you're single, the Page of Wands indicates that someone new may spark your interest, or that you're ready to approach love with a fresh, optimistic mindset.

reversed.keywords: Impulsiveness, restlessness, boredom, lack of direction.
reversed.advice: Avoid making hasty decisions in love. Take time to reflect on your desires and avoid rushing into a relationship without thought.
reversed.description: In the reversed position, the Page of Wands suggests restlessness or impulsiveness in your love life. You may feel bored or uncertain about your current relationship, or you might be rushing into romantic situations without considering the consequences. This card advises you to take a step back and reflect on what you truly want before making any major decisions in love.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is enthusiastic, creative, and full of energy. They are likely to be passionate about new ideas and enjoy exploring life’s possibilities.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with maintaining focus or following through on their ideas, often starting new projects or relationships but lacking commitment.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet your soulmate during a time of exploration and new beginnings, likely when you or they are pursuing a new creative endeavor or passion.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when either of you is feeling unsure or uncertain about your direction in life, seeking new experiences but unsure of how to commit.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is adventurous and full of curiosity. Both partners are eager to explore new emotional experiences, fostering a relationship based on excitement and discovery.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional impulsiveness or immaturity. One or both partners could be emotionally unprepared for the depth of the connection, leading to instability.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from immaturity or a lack of direction, leading to difficulties in building a stable and committed relationship.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from indecision or the inability to follow through on promises, creating uncertainty in the relationship.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Embrace your creative side and pursue new opportunities with an open mind. Your soulmate will be drawn to your adventurous and passionate spirit.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Focus on developing your sense of direction and commitment before seeking a relationship. Be clear about what you want before diving in.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the importance of passion, creativity, and the excitement of new beginnings in love.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn the value of patience and persistence, especially when building a lasting and meaningful connection.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be full of excitement and creative energy, where both partners inspire each other to explore new possibilities.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may struggle if there is a lack of commitment or follow-through, but with patience and understanding, it can grow into something stable.

name: Knight of Wands (Card 12 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Action, adventure, energy, passion, impulsiveness.
uprigth.advice: Embrace your passion and energy to pursue your goals with confidence. Take action, but be mindful of acting too impulsively without considering the consequences.
uprigth.description: The Knight of Wands represents bold action, adventure, and a passionate drive toward achieving goals. This card indicates that you are ready to charge ahead, full of energy and enthusiasm, to accomplish what you set out to do. The Knight of Wands is courageous and unafraid to take risks, making it a great time to act on your ideas and ambitions. However, while this knight is driven by excitement, the card also warns against impulsive behavior. It’s important to stay grounded and mindful of the consequences before rushing into any major decisions or commitments.

reversed.keywords: Recklessness, impatience, haste, lack of focus, scattered energy.
reversed.advice: Slow down and think carefully before acting. Avoid making impulsive decisions, and take time to ensure that your actions align with your long-term goals.
reversed.description: The Knight of Wands reversed suggests recklessness, impatience, or scattered energy. You may be rushing into things without proper planning or thought, leading to mistakes or setbacks. The reversed Knight of Wands indicates that your passion and enthusiasm may be getting the best of you, causing you to act impulsively. This card encourages you to slow down, refocus your energy, and approach your goals with a more balanced and thoughtful mindset. Take the time to plan your next steps and ensure that your actions are aligned with your long-term vision.

uprigth.keywords: Passion, adventure, pursuit, confidence, boldness.
uprigth.advice: Follow your passions in your relationship. Be bold, but ensure that you’re not acting recklessly or selfishly.
uprigth.description: The Knight of Wands is a card of passion and adventure in love. It suggests a bold and confident approach to romance, filled with excitement and a sense of pursuit. If you’re in a relationship, the Knight of Wands indicates that things may be heating up and moving quickly, with both partners embracing the adventure. If you’re single, this card suggests that someone passionate and energetic may be entering your life. The energy is intense, but be careful not to let the excitement lead to impulsive actions.

reversed.keywords: Recklessness, haste, impatience, in-and-out energy.
reversed.advice: Slow down and avoid rushing into relationships or making impulsive decisions. Reflect on the long-term consequences of your actions.
reversed.description: The reversed Knight of Wands suggests recklessness or impatience in your love life. You may be acting impulsively, jumping into relationships without considering the long-term implications. This card warns against being too hasty or allowing your passion to override your judgment. It can also indicate someone in your life who comes and goes, bringing instability to your relationship.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is bold, adventurous, and passionate. They are likely to be impulsive and always ready to take on new challenges and experiences.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with recklessness or impulsive decisions, sometimes acting without thinking, which could lead to instability in the relationship.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will likely meet your soulmate during a time of action and adventure, possibly when you or they are pursuing a bold new goal or project.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them during moments of impulsive action or when either of you is making sudden, life-changing decisions.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is passionate and bold. Both partners feel a strong emotional drive, often expressing their feelings with enthusiasm and intensity.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional inconsistency or recklessness. One or both partners could be emotionally volatile, leading to highs and lows in the connection.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from impulsive behavior or a lack of long-term planning, leading to short-lived excitement but difficulty building stability.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from reckless actions or an unwillingness to commit, which may create tension or uncertainty.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Be bold and take risks in life and love. Your soulmate will admire your adventurous spirit and willingness to embrace change.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on balancing your desire for excitement with long-term stability. Avoid jumping into relationships without thinking them through.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the power of passion and the importance of taking bold steps in love, even if it means facing challenges.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn the value of patience and careful consideration in relationships, especially when dealing with impulsive emotions.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be full of adventure and passion, where both partners inspire each other to take bold and exciting risks.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face difficulties if impulsive actions lead to instability, but with balance and patience, it can grow into something deeper.

name: Queen of Wands (Card 13 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Confidence, determination, independence, charisma, creativity.
uprigth.advice: Be bold and confident in expressing yourself and pursuing your goals. Trust in your abilities and embrace your creative potential.
uprigth.description: The Queen of Wands represents confidence, determination, and creative energy. She is independent and charismatic, inspiring others with her vibrant spirit and enthusiasm. This card suggests that you are stepping into your power, embracing your inner strength, and expressing yourself with confidence. The Queen of Wands encourages you to pursue your passions and goals with determination and to trust in your creative abilities. Whether in your career, relationships, or personal life, this card reminds you to take charge and be unapologetically yourself. It’s a time to shine and let your unique talents guide you toward success.

reversed.keywords: Insecurity, self-doubt, introversion, lack of confidence, control issues.
reversed.advice: Overcome self-doubt by reconnecting with your strengths. Avoid being overly controlling and allow yourself to express your creativity more freely.
reversed.description: The Queen of Wands reversed suggests insecurity, self-doubt, or a lack of confidence. You may be feeling uncertain about your abilities or hesitant to take bold action. This card indicates that you may be holding yourself back from fully expressing your potential, possibly due to fear or external pressure. The reversal encourages you to reconnect with your inner strength and overcome self-doubt. It’s important to trust in your abilities and allow yourself to step into the spotlight. Avoid trying to control every situation and embrace a more relaxed and creative approach to your goals.

uprigth.keywords: Confidence, independence, warmth, charisma, passion.
uprigth.advice: Bring warmth and confidence into your relationship. Lead with your heart, but maintain your independence and sense of self.
uprigth.description: The Queen of Wands represents confidence, independence, and warmth in love. If you’re in a relationship, this card suggests that you and your partner are bringing passion and charisma to your connection. The Queen of Wands encourages you to embrace your independence while being open and nurturing in love. If you're single, this card suggests that your confidence and magnetic energy are attracting others. You are in a place of personal power, ready to share your warmth and passion with the right person.

reversed.keywords: Jealousy, controlling behavior, insecurity, lack of confidence.
reversed.advice: Avoid allowing jealousy or insecurity to damage your relationship. Rebuild your confidence and trust in both yourself and your partner.
reversed.description: The reversed Queen of Wands suggests jealousy or insecurity in a relationship. You may be struggling with feelings of inadequacy or fear, which could lead to controlling behavior or tension. This card advises you to rebuild your confidence and address any issues of insecurity that are affecting your connection. It’s important to maintain trust and independence, rather than letting negative emotions take over.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is confident, independent, and charismatic. They possess a magnetic energy that draws others in and are passionate about pursuing their dreams.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with controlling their temper or emotions, and at times may appear domineering or self-centered, leading to challenges in balancing the relationship.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet your soulmate when either of you is stepping into a position of confidence or leadership, possibly during a time of personal empowerment.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when either of you is dealing with issues of self-worth or confidence, needing to find balance in personal and emotional power.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is confident and inspiring. Both partners are emotionally secure and supportive of each other, creating a vibrant and empowering relationship.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional jealousy or control issues. One or both partners could be emotionally domineering or insecure, causing tension in the connection.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may stem from strong personalities clashing, leading to power struggles or disagreements on how to approach challenges in the relationship.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could arise from jealousy, possessiveness, or an inability to balance independence with the needs of the relationship.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Embrace your own confidence and passions. Your soulmate will be drawn to your authenticity and self-assured nature.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on finding balance between self-confidence and humility. Focus on fostering healthy communication and emotional stability in your relationships.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you the value of independence and self-expression, while also highlighting the importance of emotional support in a partnership.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn about the dangers of pride and possessiveness, and how to balance personal power with emotional vulnerability.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be passionate and dynamic, where both partners inspire each other to pursue their dreams while supporting each other.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face challenges if there is a struggle for control, but with communication and balance, it can still thrive and grow stronger.

name: King of Wands (Card 14 in the Wands)

uprigth.keywords: Leadership, vision, charisma, entrepreneurship, inspiration.
uprigth.advice: Lead with confidence and vision. Take charge of your path, inspire others, and trust in your ability to create positive change.
uprigth.description: The King of Wands represents strong leadership, vision, and the ability to inspire others. He is a natural-born leader who takes charge of situations with confidence and enthusiasm. This card suggests that you are in a position of authority or influence, and it’s time to take charge of your goals and ambitions. The King of Wands encourages you to embrace your leadership qualities and to inspire others with your vision and passion. Whether in your career, personal life, or creative endeavors, this card reminds you that you have the power to create positive change and to lead by example.

reversed.keywords: Arrogance, control, lack of direction, impulsiveness, overbearing behavior.
reversed.advice: Avoid being overly controlling or arrogant in your approach. Reevaluate your goals and find a more balanced and focused way to lead.
reversed.description: The King of Wands reversed suggests arrogance, impulsiveness, or a lack of clear direction. You may be overextending your authority or trying to control situations too forcefully, leading to conflict or frustration. The reversed King of Wands warns against being overly domineering or ignoring the input of others. This card encourages you to step back, reassess your goals, and approach leadership with more balance and humility. It’s important to find a clear vision and to lead with inspiration rather than force.

uprigth.keywords: Leadership, vision, passion, motivation, boldness.
uprigth.advice: Take charge of your love life with confidence and vision. Lead with passion, but be mindful of your partner’s needs and desires.
uprigth.description: The King of Wands represents leadership and confidence in love. If you're in a relationship, this card suggests that you or your partner are taking charge and leading with vision and passion. The King of Wands brings a sense of stability and strength, encouraging you to build a strong, lasting connection. If you're single, this card indicates that someone confident and charismatic may enter your life, bringing excitement and bold energy.

reversed.keywords: Arrogance, overconfidence, domineering, impulsiveness.
reversed.advice: Avoid being too controlling or arrogant in your relationship. Balance your leadership with respect for your partner’s independence.
reversed.description: In the reversed position, the King of Wands suggests arrogance or domineering behavior in love. You may be acting impulsively or trying to control the relationship too much, which could lead to tension. This card urges you to strike a balance between leadership and collaboration, ensuring that your partner feels respected and valued.

SoulmateCharacteristics.upright: Your soulmate is a natural leader, visionary, and full of ambition. They are confident, inspiring, and take charge when it comes to achieving their goals.
SoulmateCharacteristics.reversed: Your soulmate may struggle with arrogance or controlling tendencies, sometimes focusing too much on their own needs and not enough on the partnership.

WhenYouWillMeetThem.upright: You will meet your soulmate when either of you is in a leadership role or pursuing a significant career or life goal, possibly during a time of ambition and achievement.
WhenYouWillMeetThem.reversed: You may encounter them when either of you is dealing with frustrations about personal success, leadership challenges, or issues with self-confidence.

EmotionalConnection.upright: The emotional connection is strong, visionary, and passionate. Both partners are emotionally driven and focused on building a lasting, powerful connection that fuels their mutual growth.
EmotionalConnection.reversed: The relationship may struggle with emotional arrogance or a lack of balance. One or both partners could feel emotionally neglected or overwhelmed by the intensity of the connection.

ObstaclesToUnion.upright: Obstacles may arise from a tendency to be too focused on personal goals, causing the relationship to take a back seat to ambition.
ObstaclesToUnion.reversed: Challenges could stem from pride, ego clashes, or an unwillingness to compromise, creating tension in the relationship.

AdviceOnFindingThem.upright: Focus on your own ambitions and passions, but be open to partnerships where both partners support each other’s leadership and goals.
AdviceOnFindingThem.reversed: Work on balancing personal ambition with emotional connection. Be open to sharing the spotlight and prioritizing the relationship alongside personal success.

LessonsFromTheRelationship.upright: This relationship will teach you about the power of partnership in achieving personal and shared goals, as well as the importance of mutual support.
LessonsFromTheRelationship.reversed: You may learn the value of humility and the importance of balancing ambition with emotional vulnerability and compromise.

OutcomeOrFuturePotential.upright: The relationship has the potential to be one of mutual empowerment and ambition, where both partners inspire each other to reach greater heights together.
OutcomeOrFuturePotential.reversed: The relationship may face challenges if pride and ego dominate, but with open communication and humility, it can grow into a supportive and dynamic union.
